description: For someone who has headphones and a smartphone with Qi wireless charging, this two-in-one desktop stand offers a convenient way to display and charge those headphones along with one other device. The sturdy stand has an attractive modern design that fits well on a desk or nightstand.

name: GoPro Hero11 Black
description: The new GoPro Hero11 Black camera is perfect for the adventure seeker in your midst. It’s waterproof, rugged, small and able to capture breathtaking content where other cameras can’t go. This GoPro captures stills at 27 megapixels and video at up to 5.3K at 60 frames per second. The camera has specialty shooting modes and features that allow it to be used in bright sunlight, low light, or even underwater. It also supports live streaming and wireless connectivity to any mobile device. Buy from GoPro to get bonuses, like a one-year GoPro subscription and accessories (worth $350).

name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Generation)
description: While the Apple Watch SE (2nd Generation) doesn't offer all the more sophisticated advancements of the new Apple Watch Series 8, the SE provides a vast collection of features which cover the basics and beyond. That includes Apple’s new Crash Detection feature to summon help if you’re in a vehicular accident. This is a powerful, multi-purpose smartwatch for iPhone users that’s good on any wrist—and it tells the time too. (If you’re not crazy about this one, check out our complete list of

name: Satechi Aluminum Desktop Tablet Stand
description: When sitting at a desk working, it’s often useful to prop up a tablet so you can view the screen without having to hold it. The Satachi Aluminum Desktop Stand is an affordable and adjustable option with a modern-looking design.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 DualSense Wireless Controller
description: The PlayStation 5 gaming console tops every gamer’s wish list. For an enhanced gaming experience, snag one of these PS5 wireless controllers while you can. The DualSense Wireless Controller gives better control and greater accuracy, as well as adds haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for use with supported

description: For the audio lover in your midst, the Bang & Olufsen Beoplay Portal offers a listening experience that goes well beyond combining noise cancellation with superior audio quality. Dubbed a high-end gaming headset, Beoplay Portal also serves as versatile Bluetooth

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: The Nintendo Switch OLED is the best way to play a vast selection of video games starring some of the world’s best-known characters—among them Mario, Luigi, Zelda, Donkey Kong and, of course, all the Pokémon. This system offers the widest selection of non-violent and character-driven

name: Nanoleaf Canvas Color-Changing Light Squares
description: One of the easiest and least expensive ways to enhance a room’s ambiance is to add smart lighting. The Nanoleaf Canvas starter kit makes doing so easy, with nine square light panels you can easily attach to a wall using removable adhesive. With the Nanoleaf mobile app, you can choose a color scheme and animation style to match your mood or activity with a few on-screen taps.

name: Apple AirTag 4 Pack
description: Apple’s AirTag is the easiest way for iPhone users to keep track of personal items, like your luggage or keys. These tiny round Bluetooth trackers use the Find My app preinstalled on the iPhone to locate the missing object. The interchangeable battery inside lasts for about one year.

name: Oura Ring Gen 3 Horizon
description: Wear the Oura Ring Horizon 24/7 on your finger. It automatically tracks movement, breathing, blood oxygen level, body temperature and more. With its smartphone app, it provides comprehensive feedback and guidance while serving as an accurate sleep monitor and sleep coach. The ring can even predict when you’re getting sick and warn you of anything unusual based on its ongoing readings. It’s a great gift for anyone who is health and fitness conscious or who wants to better understand how their body reacts to their daily living, sleep, stress level and activity habits.

name: Insta360 X3
description: This brand-new action camera from Insta360 shoots 72-megapixel still images and 4K video at up to 60fps. It also captures stunning 360-degree still images and 5.7K 360-degree video, for creating you-are-there vistas. You can hold the vertically designed X3 in one hand, or you can mount it on a selfie stick or tripod. It’s waterproof, temperature resistant and durable. Whether you’re shooting from a first- or third-person perspective, the X3 is easy to operate and versatile.

name: Google Nest Video Doorbell
description: Ideal for a household that wants to enhance security and monitor who approaches their doorway, the Google Nest Video Doorbell is a low-cost, versatile option. It works with the Google Home app and is compatible with Google Assistant and Alexa. This

name: SanDisk Extreme PRO Portable SSD V2
description: The SanDisk Extreme Pro Portable SSD V2 is not only portable, it is also waterproof and extremely durable. It’s ideal for reliable data storage and creating backups on-the-go, regardless of where you are. This drive has a speedy 2,000MB per second read/write speed over the supplied USB Type-C cable. Choose among 1TB, 2TB and 3TB capacities.

name: Mophie 4-In-1 Wireless Charging Mat
description: For the tech-savvy people in your life who already own all the latest gadgets, this 4-in-1 wireless charging mat can power multiple Qi-compatible devices—including a smartphone, smartwatch and wireless earbuds—at the same time. Plus, it eliminates cable clutter and keeps all of your devices in one place.

name: Ember Temperature Controlled Smart Mug²
description: Whatever your chosen beverage—coffee, tea, hot cocoa, or some other wintertime concoction—this 14-ounce mug keeps your drink at a consistent temperature. You can select a temperature between 120 and 145-degrees. The internal battery lasts for up to 80 minutes, but the included charging coaster keeps the mug operational all day. Control it using an iPhone or Android mobile app.

name: Insignia F20 Series Smart TV 24-Inch
description: Ideal for a child’s bedroom, kitchen, or dorm room, this 24-inch smart TV offers 720p resolution and is ready to stream content from almost any video streaming service thanks to its integrated Amazon FireTV operating system. It comes with an Alexa-enabled voice remote. Best of all, the TV comes in at well under $100.

name: Netvue Birdfy Feeder Cam
description: The Netvue Birdfy Feeder Cam is the ideal gift for a bird watcher or nature enthusiast. This weatherproof bird feeder has a built-in 1080p camera so they can watch activity live or see recorded footage via their smartphone or tablet. Best of all, the camera uses artificial intelligence to immediate identify over 6,000 bird species. An optional $4.99 monthly subscription unlocks additional features. The feeder holds up to 50 ounces of food and is easy to fill from the top.

name: Apple iPad (10th Generation)
description: The tenth-generation Apple iPad features a beautiful 10.9-inch touchscreen with up to 500 nits brightness. While it’s not Apple’s top-of-the-line iPad, this is a great “starter” tablet for adults or students, with 64GB of storage onboard (256GB is an extra-cost option). The tablet has Apple’s A14 Bionic chip inside, a step up from the previous generation, but not as powerful as the pricier iPad Air or iPad Pro. The rear camera gets an upgrade, while the front camera gets a new location for improved video calls.

name: Backbone One Mobile Gaming Controller For iPhone
description: This handy little device lets iPhone gamers experience control over their favorite mobile games as if they’re playing a PlayStation, complete with the enhanced control of analogue triggers, tactile buttons and clickable thumbsticks. It also allows them to play any games offered by the PS Remote Play, Xbox Game Pass, Steam or Apple Arcade online gaming services (plus other online gaming networks too). The Backbone One Mobile Gaming Controller for iPhone supports any iPhone, including the latest iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max models. This device’s design is similar to the popular PlayStation DualSense controller. It’s a great gift for PlayStation gamers who also have an iPhone.

name: Ultimate Ears Boom 3 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Not only is this portable Bluetooth speaker stylish, waterproof and extremely rugged, it’s one of the few with this shape to make music sound superb—complete with a decent level of bass. It’s also great for streaming podcasts and audiobooks from an Internet-connected mobile device or computer. The battery lasts up to 15 hours. And if taken into the tub or a pool, because the Boom 3 floats.

name: Xebec Tri-Screen 2
description: The Xebec Tri-Screen 2 is the perfect gift for multitaskers. It attaches to almost any laptop—without magnets or glue—and provides two additional 10.1-inch, 1,920 x 1,200-pixel pull-out screens for additional screen real estate. The super thin unit weighs under two pounds and fits in a laptop bag. The displays have a 60Hz refresh rate, adjustable brightness and 180-degree rotation.

name: Attop X-Pack 18 Drone
description: The Attop X-Pack 18 is an easy-to-fly portable, foldable drone suitable for pilots over the age of 12. It comes with a convenient carrying case, plus two batteries. Each battery offers enough juice for a 20-minute flight. The built-in 1080p camera provides a 120-degree field of view, so you can capture stunning wide-angle video or still images during flights—all while piloting the drone from a smartphone that’s connected to the supplied controller. The drone is also compatible with most VR glasses.

name: Small Acrylic Photo Magnet
description: These chunky 2 x 2 inch magnets are small but mighty. Made from durable acrylic, they won’t crack or scratch like glass or other plastics. Like your memories, they’re made to last.

name: Polk Magnifi Mini
description: Regardless of your TV’s size, if you want to improve sound quality—and make the dialogue easier to understand—the compact Polk Magnifi Mini delivers big sound to fill a small to mid-size space. The soundbar even comes with a wireless subwoofer that helps make anything you're watching sound more immersive and lifelike. It works with any TV, cable box, or satellite TV setup and offers virtual surround sound. However, if you want genuine surround sound, you can buy the Polk SR2 Wireless Surrounds rear speakers separately ($199). This soundbar includes two 0.5-inch (round) tweeters and four 2.25-inch (round) midrange drivers that generate 150 watts of audio power.

name: Lume Cube RGB Panel GO
description: This color LED light panel is ideal for shedding light on any subject while on-the-go. It offers selectable colors, adjustable brightness and includes a silicone softening diffuser. The 4.8 x 2.6 x 0.3-inch light panel has 210 full-color LEDs and lasts up to 90 minutes with continuous use at 100% brightness. It includes a cold shoe camera mount and a tripod mount. This light makes a great gift for amateur photographers and social media content creators alike.

name: Joby GripTight PRO 2 GorillaPod
description: Suitable for any smartphone, the Joby GripTight Pro GrillaPod is a portable tripod with flexible legs that can adapt to an uneven surface or securely wrap around an object. The tripod allows the smartphone to be positioned in portrait or landscape mode and it has a cold shoe mount on top to hold an external light or microphone. This is a great gift for smartphone photographers, content creators and frequent travelers.

name: Amazon Fire HD 8 Plus
description: For anyone who wants an affordable and versatile tablet, the Amazon Fire HD 8 fits the bill—and it is a good choice if you use Amazon’s digital media services. It has pre-installed apps to handle a wide range of tasks—from listening to music and streaming video, to shopping and managing email. This basic model comes with 8GB of internal storage. It can expand to up to 1TB using an optional memory card. The eight-inch display offers 1,280 x 800 pixels. The tablet itself supports wired or wireless charging and has up to a 12-hour battery life.

name: The Original Rubik’s Connected
description: The Original Rubik’s Connected is a recreation of the traditional Rubik’s Cube puzzle, but with a high-tech twist. This device pairs wirelessly with a mobile device and uses an app that helps you solve the puzzle or lets you compete against others from around the world who are trying to solve it. It includes a selection of mini-games using the cube and app.

name: Govee Envisual TV LED Backlights with Camera
description: You can attach this affordable Govee light strip to the back of any TV and use the device’s camera to match the colors and brightness in real-time to what’s being watched on the TV screen. This creates a more immersive viewing experience that works perfectly on any TV with a screen size between 55 and 65 inches. You can also control the lights using a mobile app or voice command via Alexa or Google Assistant.

name: Scosche GoBat Qi Wireless Charging Power Bank
description: For people who don’t always have time to charge their smartphone via an electrical outlet, this portable power bank from Scosche comes to the rescue. This model is MagSafe compatible for use with iPhone 12, iPhone 13 and iPhone 14 models. It also works with any Qi wireless charging device. It uses a USB Type-C port for charging. Inside sits a 5,000 mAh lithium-polymer battery.

name: Apple TV 4K (2022, 64GB)
description: The

name: Custom Photo Insulated Coffee Mug
description: Give them a daily reminder of something that brings them joy by putting it right on their daily cup of coffee. The insulated mug is a great gift for keeping their beverage warm in a drafty or cold workspace, and it’s made even better by the personal touch of a favorite photo.

name: Initial Wreath By Tumbalina Photo Collage Puzzle
description: Puzzles have experienced a renaissance these last few years, but there’s nothing like a puzzle featuring your favorite people and memories. Create a custom photo collage using one of CVS’s many layouts for this 252-piece, 11 x 13 inch puzzle.

name: Black And White Photo Collage Calendar
description: A classic desk calendar with a modern wood block twist gives you 12 premium cardstock cards to customize with photos that will last all year. This 8.2 x 5.9 inch memento might become your annual go-to photo gift. (You can even specify the start month so none of the cards go to waste.)

name: Glorious Plaid Woven Photo Blanket
description: While these woven photo blankets may seem too pretty to use, they’re made for getting wrapped up and cozy. Woven from 100% cotton, this blanket is as soft as it is durable.

name: Classic Collage Hanging Canvas
description: Remember your best times together with a custom collage of your favorite photos. Whether it was prom, a vacation or a milestone celebration, the 11 x 14 canvas with poplar wood fastened ends is a simple and stylish way to commemorate it. And you can get it the same day you order it, for those of us in a rush.

name: Ceramic Joy Photo Ornament
description: This whimsical ceramic ornament will be as fun to open as a gift as it will be to put on the tree year after year—no matter what joyful event or person it commemorates.

name: Studio Standard Double Sided Photo Book
description: For all those last-minute shoppers who still want to give a heartfelt gift, look no further: This album can be ordered and picked up on the very same day. Select your favorite images from a family event and drop them into the layouts before you print one for each person.

name: Love Script 3 x 3 Inch Photo Cube
description: For the person who loves options and doesn’t have a lot of desk space, give multiple photos with this handy photo cube. It’s easy to let time pass without updating the pictures on a desk or dresser, but an up-to-date batch always brightens the mood.

name: Panoramic Photo Canvas Print
description: Bring their favorite place into their personal space with this panoramic canvas print that comes in either 10 x 20 inch, or 12 x 36 inch sizes. Go on, grab a great shot from their favorite vacation and bring it back to life.

name: Wild One Dog Treat Pouch And Poop Bag Holder
description: Dog lovers know to never leave home without two essentials: treats and poop bags. Wild One makes toting these items a fashion forward endeavor thanks to their Treat Pouch that’s available in six pleasing hues. For added convenience, the pouch includes roomy compartments for your personal belongings like your phone, keys and cash, too. Made of recycled knit (from 10 water bottles), the pouch has an adjustable strap so it can be worn as either a trendy belt bag or a cozy crossbody.

name: The Lupo Sweater By Ruby Rufus
description: A dog lover’s camera roll is likely overflowing with insanely cute pics of their pooch. Lots of people even create Instagram accounts solely dedicated to showing off their dogs fabulous and super cute life. The Lupo Sweater by Ruby Rufus is a classic 100% cashmere turtleneck sweater that will make any pup look picture perfect. Of course it’s functional too, serving to keep that spoiled, er lucky, dog warm on cold days.

name: Custom Pet Portrait Cookie Cutter
description: Now here’s a gift for the pet owner with a delicious sense of humor. Send in a picture of their beloved dog’s face, and receive an adorable cookie cutter made in their likeness in return. Use it to bake up a batch of cookies featuring their paws-itively precious face for their birthday celebration or to honor them on any occasion. Crafty bakers can also use this cookie cutter to whip up homemade dog biscuits, for a truly original treat.

name: Personalized Pet Coffee Mug
description: The only thing better than sipping on a hot cup of morning brew is sipping it from a mug with that sweet lovable face artfully painted front and center. Simply submit a favorite pet photo to receive an 11-ounce mug bearing a painterly interpretation of it along with a printed name at the top. Customize it further by choosing from four color options, two font types and featuring up to three pets on one mug. This is a heartwarming hit for any pet parent—guaranteed.

name: Welcome Home Puppy Gift Set
description: This gift set, curated by luxury dog brand Harry Barker and customized by Mark & Graham, will help welcome the newest four-legged bundle of joy to their pack. The basket includes a fluffy blanket, a rope leash and rope toy, a llama plushie and a waste bag holder. All products are made of recycled and eco-conscious materials. Mark & Graham will monogram the basket with puppy’s name to ensure it houses all of their toys for a lifetime.

name: Waterpik Pet Wand Pro Dog Shower Attachment
description: For the dog lover whose pet hates going to the groomer, this professional-grade bathing wand from Waterpik will be a welcome gift. It rinses all types of fur like a boss and can easily be attached to a showerhead pipe, garden hose or utility sink right at home. The Pet Wand Pro’s even comb-like streams of water can be adjusted on the fly via a dial on the handle for higher or lower pressure, flow control or to pause flow completely. The Waterpik Pet Wand Pro comes with an 8-foot-long hose, a garden hose adapter and a nifty shower diverter—so it can be left connected without affecting the human showerhead’s functionality.

name: Jiobit GPS Location Tracker For Pets
description: Ever wonder where the dog goes when it sneaks out in to the neighborhood? Clip the Jiobit to any dog’s collar and find out. This real-time, waterproof and rugged GPS device sends a notification to your phone whenever the boundary of a “trusted location,” like the backyard, is crossed. If a fence is jumped, Mom and Dad can track down the dog’s location on a real-time map—which also offers tremendous peace of mind for almost any pet owner. Note: The Jiobit’s battery does need to be charged about once a week, and because Jiobit needs to communicate via a cellular network, it requires a $9 per month subscription.

name: Dog Bowl Made of Durable Ceramic
description: If you’ve noticed that your friend’s dog is still eating out of a cheap plastic bowl, help them step it up a notch. Fable’s smartly priced ceramic bowl has an easily cleaned glossy interior, a weighted base that won’t easily flip over and a rugged, food-safe and pup-tested construction. It’s available in four colors: rose, dark gray, light gray and “tofu,” which appears to be off-white. Whichever color you choose, this bowl’s minimalist design will blend into the home décor with ease.

name: Outward Hound Hide A Squirrel Plush Dog Toy Puzzle
description: Test the dog’s problem-solving abilities with this plush puzzle of stuffed squirrels hiding inside a log. Whether they’re searching on their own or with guidance from a human, the hidden squirrels encourage a dog’s natural hunting and foraging instincts. There are a slew of puzzle variations (including, a bee hive and a surf van) in a variety of sizes, and the animals are replaceable when they inevitably get chewed up.

name: Lesotc Travel Water Bottle For Dogs
description: There are plenty of human hydration options on the market, but this brilliantly designed water bottle is especially made for the dogs. Perfect to tote on walks, hiking and road trips, this water bottle’s folding cap can be used as a water bowl anytime, anywhere. It’s leakproof, BPA-free, lightweight and available in several sizes and colors.

name: Peaches And Cream Harness Walk Set
description: Transform their daily walk into a fashion-forward frolic with this walk set from The Foggy Dog. The peaches and cream set includes a coordinating leash, matching harness and waste bag pouch—all featuring high-quality solid brass hardware. Available in multiple prints and sizes, there’s a set that almost any fashionable dog lover will adore.

name: Happy Lion Car Seat Dog Bed
description: One of a dog’s great joys in life is a car ride alongside their favorite human. This car seat/dog bed hybrid gives dogs a safe and cozy position in the passenger seat. The pillows in the front and back of the seat help keep dogs cozy, and owners can attach their dog’s harness to the embedded strap as an added precaution. Made from waterproof and washable material, the lightweight car seat also folds up and has gym bag handles for easy transport.

name: Fab Slabs Natural Wood Paddle Board
description: “Perfect for party hosts or home cooks, Fab Slabs are hygienic, useful and suitable for display. These all-wood boards are made in Australia and are naturally antimicrobial. I have (and love) a bigger Fab Slab, but I'd use this paddle version for slicing and serving charcuterie.” —

name: Amazon Kindle E-Reader
description: Satisfy his inner bookworm with one of Amazon’s best-selling Kindle e-readers. Full disclosure, this 2022 model packs a sharp, 300 ppi glare-free display and 16GB of memory so dad can amass books to his heart’s content—acquiring stacks of books.

name: Victrola Re-Spin Bluetooth Suitcase Record Player
description: The Victrola Re-Spin is a record player complete with built-in speakers, subwoofer and Bluetooth—all bundled into its own suitcase-style carrying case. It’s ready to play classic or new vinyl records in minutes. It’s also the perfect way to introduce a new generation of digital-savvy young people to the world of vinyl records. The belt-driven, three-speed turntable has anti-vibration bushings to prevent skipping and scratching.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
description: These comfortable wireless earbuds are a great choice for frequent travelers and office workers. They have excellent noise cancellation, and they can adapt to your environment as the level of ambient sounds change. You never have to tinker with volume control as you move from louder areas to quieter ones, or vice versa. The noise cancellation also contributes to producing crystal-clear, hands-free phone calls and it works exceptionally well with or without listening to audio. Enjoy near total silence when you want to sleep on a noisy airplane, for example.

name: Garmin Bounce Smartwatch For Kids
description: Tech-savvy kids between the ages of eight and 12 will love this easy-to-use yet powerful smartwatch. It requires a $10 per month cellular service plan to allow for phone-free texts, voice messages, safety and tracking features. Instead of allowing a child to make calls, it offers voice and text messaging between a child and up to 20 pre-approved people. And while a parent can check the location of their child anytime, it also allows a child to quickly call for help. The Do Not Disturb feature prevents the wearer from using most watch features during school or at night.

name: Hohem iSteady Mobile Plus
description: The iSteady Mobile+ gimbal stabilizer offers a low-cost way to create professional-looking video footage using a smartphone. It’s ideal for vloggers and vacationers who want to eliminate shaking in their footage and create smooth and steady content. This device offers face and object tracking, along with 600-degree rotation at the touch of a button. It weighs just over one pound and is compact. The 3-axis gimbal also doubles as a tabletop tripod. The internal battery lasts for up to 13 hours of continuous use.

name: Lovesac Xbox Bundle (Limited Edition)
description: The gamers in your life will love this exclusive Lovesac Xbox bundle. It includes an Xbox Series S gaming console, a three month Ultimate Game Pass and a Lovesac Supersac with a limited edition velvet Xbox-themed cover. Forget needing a couch in the game room, since up to three people can sit back and relax on this plush Supersac that uses Durafoam stuffing. It comes with a lifetime guarantee. This unique bundle is only available for a limited time, exclusively from Best Buy.

name: Courant Catch:3 Classics
description: Available in eight colors, the Courant Catch:3 offers an elegant way to wirelessly charge a Qi-certified mobile device, such as a smartphone. Made from premium Italian leather, this charger looks great on a desk or nightstand. It also helps eliminate cable clutter. On the left is a wireless charging pad and on the right is a shallow, catch all tray for placing your wallet, keys and other small items. It measures 11 x 8 x 0.6 inches.

name: Ring Alarm 5-Piece Kit (2nd Gen)
description: This low-cost security system is ideal for small homes, condos or apartments. It includes all the features you need to secure your space—a base station, keypad, contact sensor, motion sensor and range extender. It works with any Amazon Alexa smart speaker to arm and disarm it using voice commands. When triggered, it’ll send an alert to your smartphone. You can add professional, 24/7 monitoring starting at $3.99 per month. For an additional $30 each, add new

name: Lepow Z1-Gamut Portable Monitor
description: Increase multi-tasking efficiency with this Lepow portable monitor. It adds a 15.6-inch 1080p screen with two built-in speakers to any computer. With two USB Type-C ports and a miniHDMI port, you can easily connect a computer or gaming console. This monitor weighs just 1.7 pounds and is a mere 0.3 inches thick, so it’s easy to carry around. A smart cover that doubles as a stand protects the monitor when you take it on-the-go. At this price, it makes sense to buy one for the remote workers or frequent business travelers in your life, as well as for yourself.

name: Mujjo Full Leather Wallet Case for iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: Mujjo offers a full-line of beautiful leather cases for most iPhone models. This one for the iPhone 14 Pro Max offers a slim profile that wraps around the back and sides of the phone for protection, while making the phone itself look stunning. On the back is a convenient three card wallet. It’s available in black, blue or tan. One cool feature is the raised lip on the back that surrounds and protects the cameras, without blocking the lenses or flash. It’s a beautiful case with a slim, simple and sophisticated design.

name: Trove Go Portable Biometric Safe
description: The Trova Go is a portable biometric safe that can hold a collection of small items—like prescription medications, cash or jewelry—while you’re traveling. Forget having to remember a combination or unlock code. This safe can easily be unlocked via your smartphone’s built in biometric verification tool (FaceID or fingerprint scan). Trova Go also uses your smartphone’s GPS, so you can pinpoint the safe’s last known location if it gets misplaced or left behind. It fits easily in a jacket pocket, purse or briefcase. The safe itself weighs about one pound and measures 6 x 2.9 x 1 inches. Trova Go offers a sleek and durable, all-metal design that pairs with your smartphone wirelessly via Bluetooth.

name: Tribe Socks Personalized Dog Face Socks
description: Owners will show off a sense of humor (and love for their dog) all the way to their toes by wearing these customizable socks. All you need to do is upload a photo of their precious pup and Tribe Socks will create a custom pair they’ll love fur-ever. Added bonus: Each pair is made of super-soft sustainable fibers made from recycled plastic bottles.

name: Top Dog Pet Gear Travel Bag
description: Many travelers love taking their dog along as a partner in crime. When it’s time to pack up for a big outing, this airline approved carry-on travel bag makes it a breeze. The Top Dog travel bag comes with containers that store a week’s worth of food and treats, collapsible food and water bowls, a water bottle holder and plenty of room for toys, medications and grooming gear. Get ready for jet-setting, camping, hiking and beach days with a well-prepared pooch in tow.

name: Custom Watercolor Pet Portrait Painting
description: Enamored dog owners could stare at their dog’s adorable face all day. Why not make a custom portrait of their living masterpiece that they can display proudly as wall art? Send in a prized photo of the dog and the Etsy artist at Pet Portrait Galaxy will create a sweet, hand painted custom watercolor portrait that perfectly captures its essence.

name: Allbirds Men's Wool Lounger Fluffs
description: Walks in the rain, sleet or snow are par for the course for people whose dog has to go outside when duty calls. These sustainably made Merino wool loungers from Allbirds, available in both men’s and women’s sizes, will make the job easier by keeping feet warm and cozy on quick jaunts and longer walks. The cushy insole and midsole are designed to contour to the wearer’s feet which makes slipping into these slip-ons so heavenly that heading out into the cold might not seem so bad.

name: Roverlund Out-Of-Office Pet Carrier
description: The Out-Of-Office from Roverlund is a stylish airline-compliant pet carrier, car seat and travel bag, all in one. It comes with a coordinating, built-in leash that doubles as a carry strap for added security and convenience. Other thoughtful features include a waterproof, leakproof bottom, washable fleece interior lining, large pockets for storing treats and dog’s necessities, and the ability to fold flat for easy storage. The soft-sided Out-Of-Office is available in two sizes and a variety of solid and camouflage colorways.

name: L.L. Bean Boyt Two-Barrel Seat Cover
description: Treat a dog lover to a clean car and their dog to a comfy seat by gifting them this insulated seat cover. It shields the back seat after trips to the dog park, the beach or camping. The Boyt Two-Barrel Seat Cover has a reversible design that’s equipped with waterproof waxed canvas on one side and nylon fabric on the other, and adjustable buckles make it a cinch to attach the cover to the back seat headrests. Spray and wipe clean small messes—then simply let the cover air dry between adventures. When you detail the rest of the car, scrub the cover and hang it out to dry for a deeper clean.

name: Trill Paws Dog Tag With Engravable Back
description: Every dog owner dreads their dog going rogue and running off. But, whether your favorite pet is a runner or not, a collar ID tag is a must. This one is sure to elicit a laugh with the phrase “have your people call my people” on the front in scratch-resistant enamel. The price of the tag includes a monogram or name and owner’s phone number engraved on the flip side.

name: Gimars Professional Stainless Steel Dog Grooming Set
description: In recent years, out of necessity, many of us dabbled in doing our dog grooming at home. Here’s an upgrade for the owners who are never going back to the groomer (the savings are astounding!). They’ll keep honing those scissor skills with this set of professional grade, titanium coated, stainless steel grooming tools. Two pairs of straight scissors, one pair of thinning scissors, one curved pair of scissors and a grooming comb make it easier to trim and tend to a dog’s fur. The safety round tips are also a smart addition to keep dogs safe from accidental pokes.

name: The Honest Kitchen Goat's Milk N' Cookies Blueberries & Vanilla Dog Treats
description: We all know those puppy dog eyes that are begging for a treat. Make their day and toss them a gourmet cookie the next time you succumb to their charms. These Goat’s Milk n’ Cookies snacks from The Honest Kitchen are a treat that owners can feel good about giving. Far from standard filler-fueled treats, these whole-grain dog cookies are made in the USA with real goat’s milk (which contains probiotics to support digestion), blueberries and a hint of vanilla. Just as important is what they don’t contain: GMO ingredients, artificial preservatives, by-products and fillers.

name: Personalized Hooded Dog Robe
description: Pups will feel warm and cozy when wrapped in this personalized, hooded robe post-bath. The ultra-soft robe features Velcro closures for a secure fit, and microfiber material that aids in quick drying. It also includes an embroidered pawprint alongside which you can have the dog’s name embroidered as well. Note: Black thread is used for the pawprint and name. The towel itself is available in three sizes and nine color options to perfectly pair with most pooch personalities.

name: Earthbath Puppy Grooming Bundle
description: When it’s time for a bath, the shampoo needs to be gentle, do the hard work and, at the same time, make your canine’s coat smell great. Earthbath’s luxurious wild cherry 3-in-1 formula (shampoo, conditioner and detangler) will leave dogs’ skin and fur super soft fur with a fresh wild cherry scent that you’ll want to nuzzle. Between baths, use the included spritz to conveniently deodorize and detangle frazzled fur.

name: Warmies Marshmallow Brown Boots
description: “House slippers are a popular holiday gift, but have you considered serving up this favorite with a twist? Warmies’ soft, furry booties look like regular slippers, but can be popped in the microwave or freezer for the ultimate treat after a hard day’s work. Plus, they’re gently scented with lavender, going the extra mile to up the cozy factor. While they're perfect for winter, fellow cold feet sufferers (nice to meet you) will refuse to part with them year-round.” —

name: 54 Thrones Makeda In-Shower Body Melt
description: “The key to really smooth skin is hydrating before you get out of the shower. This In Shower Body Melt combines shea and cocoa butter with Egyptian black seed oil, Moroccan blue tansy, Egyptian violet leaf and immortelle oil to give your giftee the skin of their dreams. And, of course, it smells divine.” —

name: Bala Bangles One-Pound Wearable Weights (Set of Two)
description: “Whether you're looking for the perfect travel workout gear or you're in search of an ideal ankle weight to keep in your home gym, Bala Bangles Wearable Weights are by far the best wearable weights I've ever used. They fit easily in my suitcase (in fact, they are always the first thing I pack), and the slick silicone design makes them easy to keep clean. Fitness fanatics will go wild for these weights.”

name: Mariage Freres International Happy Tea
description: “I’m a big tea drinker, and I like something special and very aromatic, like Mariage Freres loose-leaf tea. This variety has rose petals, and I love all things floral.” —

name: Chanel Le Rouge Duo Ultra Tenue Liquid Lip Color
description: “I’m constantly forgetting I have lipstick on and smudging it, so Chanel’s Le Rouge Duo Ultra Tenue has changed my life as far as lipsticks go. It paints on perfectly and doesn’t smudge even if you’re eating a big meal (or kissing someone). I’m obsessed with the shades of red in particular—they’re very holiday but also just so chic for everyday statement wear.” —

name: Goodr The Devil Wears Runway Sunglasses
description: “Everyone always needs another pair of sunglasses (for the beach, car, running or traveling). I like Goodr’s polarized pairs since they reduce glare, fit well and are super affordable. They look way more expensive than $35, and if you lose them, they're easy to replace.” —

name: Catbird Threadbare Ring
description: “If you have a jewelry lover in your life, this threadbare ring is a great gift. It’s one of my favorite Catbird purchases and I find myself wearing every day as it’s simple enough for any occasion while also looking delicate and elegant. I’ve purchased a couple now so I can layer them on both my hands and it doesn't look bulky. This ring is also Meghan Markle–approved as she’s been spotted wearing it.”—

name: Roku Streaming Stick 4K Streaming Device
description: “Whether it’s to replace an older Roku or upgrade a smart TV’s less-than-stellar user interface, the Roku Streaming Stick 4K is an unbeatable choice. Obviously, it does all the streaming things—Netflix, HBO, etc.—but also delivers Dolby Vision, improved Wi-Fi connectivity and a remote that supports voice commands and controls basic TV functions. Oh, and Roku’s interface? It’s the best out of all the streamers. I’ll fight anyone who says differently.” —

name: Kate McLeod Sleep Stone
description: “Think of this as your favorite body cream in the form of a massage stone. Crafted with pampering oils and butters, and infused with various scents (my current go-to is this calming

name: Five Two by Food52 Silicone Baking Tool Set
description: “If you’re in need of a can’t-go-wrong gift for the bakers in your life, look no further. This five-tool set from Food52 has become one of my go-to kitchen items—in fact, I use it every single week to bake bread at home. Your recipient will receive both a large and small offset spatula alongside a pastry brush and bench scraper, all of which are dishwasher-safe and feature the most gorgeous slate blue hue with gold detailing.” —

name: Squishmallow Narwhal
description: “This 16-inch Narwhal named Navina makes it easy to see why Squishmallows appeal to so many ages. She’s so soft, cuddly and, yes, squishable. Plus, she comes in rainbow colors with a silver horn. I’m sure she’s going to make the perfect gift for a certain child who will squeal with absolute joy upon unwrapping her. Recommended for ages two and up.” —

name: This Works Deep Sleep Bath Soak
description: “Infused with a blend of lavender, vetiver and chamomile, these bath salts are meant to alleviate tension and prepare you for deep, restful sleep. I love using them after a long day when I’m having a hard time unwinding. If you’ve got a bath lover on your list, this deep sleep soak is a no-brainer.” —

name: Nintendo Switch Sports Game
description: “Soccer, baseball, tennis and more get kids up and moving with the Nintendo Switch Sports game. I love that it uses motion controls, turning your real-life actions into in-game movements. It’s a clever way to get kids off the couch. Even better? Kids can duel with friends and family in the same room or have a digital playdate with someone from across the world.” —

name: Williams Sonoma Wine Pairing Chocolate Bars
description: These artisan-made bars are just the thing to get the wine lovers in your life who

name: Airbnb Gift Card
description: Dad jumps at every chance he can to hit the road, so you might as well encourage his sense of wanderlust with a gift card from Airbnb. You could even book him a stay at any number of homes, cabins, condos and more if you know where he wants to travel, but we recommend a gift card so he can choose his own destination.

name: Suck UK Greeting Card Voice Recorder
description: Truth be told, Dad probably doesn’t want anything fancy, but a heartfelt message that he can cherish for a lifetime is surely a gift he’ll remember. Use this voice recorder disguised as a cassette tape to craft your message—and don’t be surprised if he plays it over and over again for years to come.

name: Timex Expedition Scout Watch
description: Dad only wishes he had more time, and while you can’t play Kronos, you can gift him time in the form of Timex’s Expedition Scout Watch. It’s decidedly simple but wonderfully capable, with an Indiglo light-up face and a water-resistant housing that holds up in showers and pool sessions.

name: Tecovas Calfskin Billfold
description: If his wallet has seen better days or looks more and more like

name: Elden Ring
description: Widely considered the best video game of 2022, Elden Ring has won over audiences worldwide for its difficulty and open-world design. It’s very different from its contemporary video games. Dad may have his sights set on becoming the new Elden Lord, but he may soon find himself on side quests that pull him deeper and deeper into this high fantasy experience.

name: Tincup American Whiskey
description: Dad appreciates the timeless magic of a good drink, and Tincup’s take on an American whiskey should please his palette. This whiskey blends high-rye bourbon with a small amount of Colorado single malt whiskey, then cuts it with Rocky Mountain water to deliver a satisfying sipper for the backyard or the backcountry.

name: Hans Grill Pizza Stone
description: Whether he’s already whipping up his own pizzas or he wants to for friends and family through the holidays, a proper pizza stone can absorb and retain heat to provide an extra-hot surface for Dad to prep his precious pies. This rectangular stone comes highly rated from Amazon, and it includes a wooden peel board for good measure.

name: Carhartt Relaxed Fit Duck Bib Overalls
description: Painting, gardening, woodworking, home improvement—dad does it all these days, but he still needs an outfit that’s built to withstand the heavy-duty jobs around the house. Carhartt’s bib overalls have been around for decades, so you know the 12-ounce, ring-spun cotton is up for all sorts of hard work. The relaxed fit makes this capable uniform comfy.

name: Arcade Belts Ranger Belt
description: Dad already owns a number of old leather belts, but because those have seen better days, now’s the time to get him a new one courtesy of Arcade Belts. Available in a number of colors, the tough and stretchy design features heavy-duty recycled polyester while the high-density plastic buckle will withstand his biggest adventures.

name: Thorogood American Heritage Moc Toe Work Boots
description: Thorogood’s six-inch moc toe boots are pricey, but they’re made in the USA and feature a slip-resistant outsole, premium leather and a Goodyear welt for superior moisture resistance. Available in five colors, you’re sure to find one that compliments his style and meets his needs whether he’s working on the job site or mowing the lawn.

name: Darn Tough Hiker Micro Crew Sock
description: In the event that Dad really wants socks, gift him a few pairs from Darn Tough. The Vermont-based textile manufacturer designs comfortable, supportive socks that come with a lifetime warranty, so Dad can swap out a worn, tattered pair for new ones as often as he’d like.

name: Dare To Roam Prodigy Backpack
description: Teachers need cool backpacks, too. Made from ethically sourced nylon, this antimicrobial backpack will help prevent the spread of bacteria, mold and germs. It features roomy compartments that are ideal for stowing work and travel essentials and is available in eight chic colors.

name: Papier Custom Colorblock Notebook
description: If you have a journaler in your life (or someone who simply loves to-do lists), consider this stunning two-tone notebook, which can be personalized with your recipient’s first and last name. There are several different colorways to choose from, including a pink-and-orange combination for the more daring recipients, a subtle green-on-green design and more.

name: Sony ZV-1F Vlog Camera
description: The new Sony ZV-1F camera is the perfect gift for a vlogger or content creator. Made for vlogging, this camera is chock full of features that content creators will truly appreciate—like autofocus tracking and the ability to defocus the background with a single button push. There’s also a soft skin effect that makes people look their best and image stabilization for shooting while in motion. The Product Showcase feature allows the camera to focus on an item the content creator holds up and then refocus on them when they put it down. Check out our

name: Rakuten Kobo Clara 2E
description: While the Amazon Kindle e-readers offer a plethora of great features, one reason to go with the Kobo Clara 2E is that this e-reader makes it very easy to borrow e-books and audiobooks from your local library, directly from the device. Of course, you can also purchase individual e-books and audiobooks from the Kobo Store. It offers a glare-free, six-inch E-Ink display and has dark mode, a front light with adjustable brightness and color temperature and blue light reduction—so it’s easy on your eyes in any lighting situation. The Clara 2E is also waterproof (IPX8 rated). It comes with 16GB of storage—enough to hold thousands of e-books or hundreds of audiobooks.

name: Govee Glide RGBIC Y Lights
description: Discover a new twist in smart lighting you can use to decorate a wall and provide colorful ambient lighting to any living space. This kit comes with seven thin, Y-shaped light panels you can configure in a visually interesting, custom design on any wall. Each panel is applied using a supplied adhesive strip. Then, using an app, the panels can light up in your choice of 16.8 million colors. The app also includes more than 40 pre-programmed scenes and eight music-syncing modes.

name: Ledger Nano S Crypto Hardware Wallet
description: Sure, investing in crypto currency can be risky. However, to reduce the risk of having a digital crypto wallet stolen, the Ledger Nano S is the perfect tool—especially for novice investors.   This small device offers security (a CC EAL5+ a security chip), along with the ability to buy, exchange and manage crypto currency assets. It supports Bitcoin, Ethereum and other popular crypto currencies. It works in conjunction with a proprietary smartphone app.

name: Kindle Scribe
description: For someone who enjoys reading and making hand-written notes, the brand-new Kindle Scribe serves as a full-featured Kindle e-reader (that also plays audiobooks) and a virtual notepad in one. It features a roomy, 10.2-inch Paperwhite display which is glare-free in any lighting situation. The Scribe comes with a pen-shaped stylus that allows you to handwrite, draw or annotate directly on the screen (although writing on books and other content is limited to using a digital pop-up note). While you can take notes within e-books as you’re reading, you can use Scribe as a virtual notepad. It comes with a variety of page templates, including lined paper, grid paper, and checklists. Battery life is up to 12 weeks, and the stylus doesn’t require charging.

name: Zens 4-In-1 Modular Wireless Charger
description: This one wireless charging platform fits nicely on a desk or nightstand and comes with the adapters needed to simultaneously charge an iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and AirPods via a wireless (MagSafe compatible) connection. Each part of the charger has a magnetic connection, so it’s easy to add more charging modules (sold separately). It includes one USB Type-C cable and a power adapter. This 4-in-1 charger makes it easy to eliminate cable clutter while making all of your devices more organized while they’re charging.

name: Asus ZenBook 17 Fold OLED Laptop
description: While not cheap, the Asus ZenBook 17 Fold futuristic computing at its best. This full-featured Intel laptop has a 17.3-inch 2K OLED touchscreen display that can fold in half. When unfolded, there’s no visible hinge or bezels, and you get a virtual keyboard. Or use it in desktop mode using the included kickstand with an external keyboard. This is a unique splurge gift for someone who needs a new laptop.

name: XGIMI MoGo Pro Portable Projector
description: This 1080p portable projector looks like a portable Bluetooth speaker and is smaller than a lunchbox. Battery life is up to two hours, so you can take movie night just about anywhere and watch your favorite flicks or shows on a projected screen up to 100 inches. The projector’s bulb is 300 lumens. Thanks to built-in Android TV 9.0, when the MoGo Pro is connected directly to Wi-Fi, you have access to all popular streaming services. You can also stream content from your computer or mobile device via Bluetooth.

name: Adonit Neo Pro
description: The Adonit Neo Pro is a lower-cost alternative to the Apple Pencil stylus for use with an iPad. This pen-shaped stylus magnetically attaches to a compatible iPad. It offers tilt sensitivity, palm rejection and a svelte design that’s made from aluminum. Battery life is up to nine hours. With the Neo Pro, writing, drawing, or annotating on an iPad’s screen (using a compatible app) is both easy and comfortable.

name: Takashi Murakami Flower Pancake Pan
description: “When you’re a parent, you can never have too many pancake tricks up your sleeve, and this mold, designed by the famous illustrator, Takashi Murakami, is destined to inspire kids and design freaks alike. Every pancake comes out in the shape of his iconic flower motif with a smile. Bonus: It also makes adorable, delicious grilled cheese sandwiches.” —

name: Leatherman Free T2 Tool
description: “There are just as many reasons to gift the Leatherman Free T2 as there are tools crammed into its slim profile (and there are exactly eight tools inside, just so you know). Designed and manufactured in Portland, Oregon, this mighty multi-tool stows a knife, pry tool, package opener and screwdrivers inside. Plus, it comes with a 25-year warranty that ensures it’ll stick around for decades to come.” —

name: Slip Silk Sleep Mask
description: “Slip’s Sleep Mask is a must-have for beauty rest: It helps block out light and prevent friction around the eyes. Plus, it’s cool to the touch, so it feels soothing, too.” —

name: Blondery Birthday Cake Variety Box
description: “I have such a sweet tooth, and Auzerais Bellamy’s bite-sized blondies never make me feel guilty about it! Bellamy has worked in many fine-dining kitchens, including as Sous Chef at Bouchon Bakery. Blondery has a range of delicious treats you can shop, but her seasonal blondie box has an over 10,000-person waitlist (so get on it). The Blondery blondies are the perfect gift for anyone who enjoys sweets, and anyone who will appreciate the experience of a luxury dessert box with interesting flavors and combinations.” —

name: Yetch Incomplete White Puzzle
description: “There’s something special about working on a puzzle with a friend. For a challenge, I love this all-white puzzle made by Simone Giertz—with one piece missing.” —

name: Echo Dot (4th Gen) Smart Speaker With Alexa
description: “The all-new, 5th generation Amazon Echo Dot is a relatively compact smart speaker with great sound quality. As it’s an Amazon product, it’s compatible with voice commands through Alexa: You can listen to any song, podcast, or audiobook you want without lifting a finger, and can also use it to control other smart devices within your home.” —

name: LolaVie Lightweight Hair Oil
description: “I always love a hair oil to tame frizz and add shine. This vegan, cruelty-free formula from LolaVie is my favorite! Lightweight Hair Oil is formulated with a vegan keratin complex and extracts such as bamboo, chia and coconut to hydrate, tame and repair.” —

name: Bombas Women's Cable Knit Gripper Slipper
description: This is by far my favorite gift I received last year, and you can bet every member of my family will have a pair under the tree this year. They carry Toddler size 5 through men’s 15—they’re the perfect gift for anyone who appreciates being cozy. I love that they are warm, washable and the grips on the bottom are great for clumsy little feet zooming through the house!” —

name: Yogasleep Dohm Uno
description: “The best gifts are unique but serve a practical purpose. A white noise machine is a perfect example. It’s simple, effective and just a little niche. It’s the type of gift that says, ‘I love you—please get some sleep.’ And who doesn’t want to hear that? This particular white noise machine is a cult favorite that’s been around since the 1960s. It operates with a single switch and uses a real fan to produce soothing, non-looping, ambient sounds. Pair it with a cozy blanket and some sleepy-time tea, and you’ve got yourself the perfect care package.” —

name: Evereden Cleanse and Nourish Bundle
description: “These three products are my go-to for my toddler. I’ve been using shampoo, oil and face cream since she was an infant. All their products smell great, especially the oil, and everything is so gentle on your child’s skin. This bundle is the perfect gift for any mom.” —

name: Philip Kingsley Scalp Shampoo
description: “This gentle formula from Philip Kingsley helps to clean the scalp while clearing build-up. Mild enough for everyday use, it leaves the hair feeling super clean and creates an optimal scalp environment. It is suitable for everyone to use, and most importantly, it is color-safe. Most scalp shampoos will cause hair color to fade and blondes to discolor; this won’t happen with this bottle.”

name: Sweet Apricity Paleo & AIP Friendly Vanilla Marshmallows
description: “I’m currently following the paleo diet, and I’ve spent too much time searching the internet for healthy swap-outs. This is one of my favorites and great for anyone who is looking for a sweet treat with zero junk energy.” —

name: 11-Bottle Gold Wine Rack
description: This hive-like wine holder has space for a total of 11 wine bottles—that’s enough to please any wine lover, even those with larger collections. It’s equal parts artful and useful, and would look lovely sitting atop a kitchen counter or placed near a bar cart. Your recipient can also decide to use it vertically or horizontally depending on their preference.

name: "Picnic At Ascot" Insulated Wine And Cheese Cooler Bag
description: This is a seriously good-looking gift—and it’s bound to get a ton of use come spring and summer. With sophisticated patterns and so much included (two acrylic wine glasses, napkins, a corkscrew and bottle stopper, a cheese knife, a hardwood cutting board and of course the tote itself), your recipient’s just hit the jackpot.

name: Aervana Electric Wine Aerator
description: Help them let their wines “breathe” with this fabulously luxe pick. Simply fit the device right on top of a bottle, then use it to dispense and aerate the liquid simultaneously.

name: Wine Advent Calendar
description: With a whopping 24 miniature bottles included, we’d actually consider this advent calendar to be a bona fide steal at just $150. It’s the perfect gift for any wine lover, with varietals from Sicily, California, Spain and more. And, of course, it’s perfectly on-theme for the holidays.

name: Williams Sonoma Wine-Chilling Wands (Set of 2)
description: Does the wine lover in your life have a bad habit of forgetting to put their bottles in the fridge or cooler? If so, consider these stainless steel wine chilling wands, which can chill wine to its ideal serving temperature in just minutes. Once the wands have spent at least three hours in the freezer, they can be placed directly into wine glasses.

name: ANNA New York Fluorite Wine Gems
description: Help keep their wine cool—and make their drinking experience thoroughly enjoyable with these fluorite “gems.” The stone patterns are stunning and sophisticated, and everything comes packaged in a gift-ready box.

name: Wine Folly Tasting Journal
description: For the wine lover who wants to develop their palate and jot down their thoughts when tasting new bottles, a dedicate wine journal is a must-have. This chic option from Wine Folly includes guided tasting notes based on a four-step method developed by top wine critics and sommeliers to help you log a bottle’s body, aroma, acidity and more. Plus, it includes a red ribbon page marker to ensure you never lose your place, as well as a wine color insert. Choose between five different colors.

name: Crate & Barrel Under Cabinet Stem Rack
description: Give your loved one the gift of brilliant, space-saving storage with this hanging stem rack, which would make a chic addition to any kitchen. Made of stainless steel and hardwood, the rack—which can hold up to 24 glasses—can be secured to any shelf using the included hardware.

name: Crate & Barrel Wood And Resin Coasters (Set of 4)
description: With these beautiful coasters, your recipient will never have to worry about their glasses leaving behind red wine stain. Made with rich acacia wood and cloudy resin, these Crate & Barrel exclusives are crafted by hand, meaning every one is unique.

name: Vinturi Classic Wine Aerator
description: Let your wine breathe as your pour with this handy acrylic aerator. Designed to help your wine release its full flavor, this aerator is a cinch to use: Simply hold it over your wine glass and pour the wine through. It also comes with a no-drip stand, a travel pouch and a sediment filter.

name: Cuisinart Private Reserve 8-Bottle Wine Cooler Fridge Cellar
description: If you

name: Maie Discovery Pack
description: Launched earlier this month, Maie is a new female-run, California-made wine company selling some of the prettiest individual-sized bottles around. While you can get nine- or twelve-packs of any of the three single-varietal wines—rosé, sauvignon blanc and pinot noir—the brand’s Discovery Pack is arguably more exciting, as it lets you try one of each.

name: Shutterfly Photo Book
description: If he’s the type to snap pictures left and right, consider organizing all those shots in a photo book from Shutterfly. The online service lets you drag and drop photos and text into a book of almost any size before it’s printed and shipped in a matter of days. Create a photo book on your own or work with Shutterfly’s free 24-hour design services where pros can design your book for you.

name: The Normal Brand Puremeso Raglan Henley
description: Fun fact: Every Dad loves a Henley, the classically styled universal men’s shirt. And this soft knit cotton from The Normal Brand is stylish, comfortable and machine washable. It’s available in five solid colors—green, teal, rust, wine and charcoal—any of which dad would be happy to wear.

name: Poligo Grilling Utensils Set
description: Maybe your dad doesn’t do much cooking in the kitchen, but the backyard is another story entirely. If the weekends are for grilling steaks, burgers, ribs and chicken, then he might need some new tools for the job. This Poligo BBQ grill tool set comes with 26 accessories, including a spatula, tongs, brush and fork. They’re all dishwasher safe and the ensemble packs into a handy carrying case so Dad can always find his go-to barbecue tools.

name: MasterClass Annual Membership
description: Does your Dad have a thing for James Cameron movies, Gordon Ramsey cooking shows or learning science from Neil deGrasse Tyson? Sign him up for a year of MasterClass and he can learn directly from these icons and dozens of other experts and celebrities. Because Dad was right all along: Learning is fun. For a limited time, get two memberships with unlimited access to MasterClass for the price of one.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: If Dad is still listening to his

name: Tertill Garden Weeding Robot
description: If Dad loves tending a garden—whether growing veggies, herbs or flowers—Tertill has a weeding robot that he will love. It automatically weeds from the start of growing season all the way through the first hard frost, eliminating the need to weed by hand anywhere in between. Tertill is weatherproof and solar-powered, so it doesn’t have to be charged or shielded from rain.

name: 6-In-1 Tooling Pen
description: It’s a pen. A black ballpoint, to be precise, just twist the barrel to write. But this pen also has rulings inscribed on the sides, a mini screwdriver with interchangeable bits and a stylus as well. It’s handy and will make Dad feel like MacGyver when he pulls it apart to fix something.

name: Arcade1Up Pac-Man Couchcade
description: Dads are just kids in bigger bodies (and as such, they play with more expensive toys). Case in point, this on-the-go console plays ten officially licensed Namco games, including the ones that Dad grew up playing in the arcade like Pac-Man, Dig Dug and Rolling Thunder. It's housed in a compact carrying case which plugs into the TV’s HDMI port and features a wireless control deck so Dad can kick back on the couch as he unwinds.

name: Mouth All the Snacks
description: If you think kids are the only ones with a sweet tooth, you haven’t met your dad yet. But don’t settle for giving him mundane treats like chocolate chip cookies—this collection of more than a dozen unexpected yet absolutely beloved snacks, all packed into one box. Give him peanut butter puffs, ginger cookies, white cheddar popcorn, pretzel nuggets and so much more. And if this particular collection doesn’t quite hit the spot, explore Mouth’s other options—they have a bunch of carefully curated boxes.

name: 57hours Gift Cards For Outdoor Adventurers
description: If Dad would love to go on a hike, mountain biking, downhill skiing, surfing or a dozen other outdoor activities, help him along the way. You can buy a 57Hours gift card (available in several denominations, starting at $100) Dad can apply to a custom adventure of his choice, tailored to his skill level.

name: Ember Temperature Control Smart Mug
description: It’s no secret that coffee can give you a jolt of energy. This mug keeps beverages warm throughout the day, making it easy to have a cup on standby for when teachers need it most—and at their preferred temperature (between 120°F to 145°F). The white color is on sale right now for $120.

name: Brooklyn Candle Studio Love Potion Reed Diffuser
description: With one whiff of Brooklyn Candle Studio’s Love Potion Reed Diffuser, the lucky recipient will want to take it home. And that’s okay, because its dreamy scent will set the tone for their after-school oasis where they can kick up their feet and finally

name: Stanley Quencher H2.0 Travel Tumbler
description: Working on their feet all day, teachers are definitely a profession that needs to hydrate. Snagging them one of the perpetually out-of-stock 40-ounce Stanley Tumblers would certainly make for one of the best gifts for teachers. The 90% recycled stainless steel cup has ergonomic handles, fits in a car cup holder and keeps drinks hot for seven hours and cold for 11 hours, so they can fill it with their fuel of choice.

name: Old Whaling Co. 2-Piece Gift Set
description: As evidenced by the name, Old Whaling Co.’s Seaweed and Sea Salt scent smells like a sea breeze (it’s also a personal favorite of one of our editors). Not only are the luscious handmade soap and rich body butter ideal for self-care, the coast-inspired fragrance is perfect for summer.

name: ProsourceFit Ki Acupressure Mat And Pillow Set
description: Multiple Vetted shopping editors swear by this acupressure mat for end-of-day relief from all those neck cricks and back pains. Lie directly on the mat, and it goes straight to work helping those knots to let go. It might be just the right pick for your overworked, multitasking teacher, too.

name: Flat Pouch Set: Backyard Fruit
description: Baggu’s Go Pouch Set comes in a slew of cool and fun patterns. Each zippered pouch is made from recycled heavyweight nylon and is perfect to help your favorite teacher get organized. The set comes with a small, medium and large pouch.

name: Tea Drops 9-Drop Ultimate Sampler
description: Teachers and tea are a natural pairing, making this Tea Drops sampler a sweet token of appreciation. Tea Drops are made of organic ground teas that dissolve in water for easy bagless brewing. (As explained by the site, “like a bath bomb, except it’s tea!”). This sampler comes in a sleek wooden box that makes a great little trinket holder once the teas are gone.

name: Hydrate and Snooze Set Laneige
description: Let her indulge her skin with this hydrating trio from Laneige. The pretty gift set available on Sephora is just $30 and includes the Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Cream Moisturizer, a sleeping face mask and the brand’s cult favorite lip mask.

name: Chantal Vintage Teakettle
description: Speaking of tea, your favorite teacher may need a chic vessel to brew some up. This vintage tea kettle from Chantal is just the pot for the job, featuring timeless style that doubles as decor.

name: F In Exams Book
description: Whether you’re on a budget or want a small add-on to round out your  gift, you can’t go wrong with this

name: Succulent Plants
description: Studies have shown that plants help reduce stress and improve productivity, so some greenery could prove to be a useful gift. This succulent three-pack is a low-maintenance option that will help make the atmosphere in the classroom more pleasant—or at least a bit more green.

name: Slip Rose Gold Silk Sleep Mask
description: Talk about luxury: This softer-than-soft eye mask is made to cradle your face and keep your sleep long and uninterrupted. It comes in a variety of beautiful colors, though we’re partial to this rose gold-hued version. The best part? The packaging is ready to gift.

name: Dagne Dover Hunter Toiletry Bag
description: This toiletry bag is made from water-resistant neoprene (the same material as wetsuits) and comes with a removable mesh zip-top pouch (so you can grab just the essentials and put it in a gym bag or purse). This cleverly designed, unisex pick is available in six shades, all of which are currently in stock but won’t last for long.

name: Scuddles Extra Large Picnic & Outdoor Blanket
description: This water-resistant blanket is perfect for outdoor excursions, be it spontaneous picnics, long days at the beach or

name: Anthropologie Delicate Monogram Necklace
description: A more unique take on the typical monogram necklace, this delicate chain features a single initial letter positioned askew and off to the side, rather than front and center, for an overall result that’s subtle and very chic.

name: MoMa Design Store Wet Pot Self Watering Pot
description: Even the best-intentioned

name: Hermès Les Mains Nail Enamel
description: Hermès is typically associated with their luxury Birkin bag, but even if you have just $50 to spend, you can give your recipient a bit of that designer feel. The French brand has a line of nail polish available in 24 shades and it comes perfectly packaged in the signature orange box. The highly pigmented shades have a slight shine and quick dry time for the person who loves an at-home manicure.

name: Bala Bangles (Set Of 2)
description: Wrist and ankle weights have come a long way from the bulky, downright ugly options from decades ago. And Bala combines fashion and function with weights that look like stylish accessories. Choose between blush, charcoal or gray and the stainless steel weights easily strap to the legs or ankles. The one-pound weights are the perfect compliment to pilates or walking around the house.

name: Tata Harper Crystal Gua Sha Spoon
description: The Tata Harper brand is well known to skincare lovers, but it’s the Gua Sha spoon that anyone will appreciate as a useful stocking stuffer. The skincare tool is made from 100% jade stone and works to sculpt and de-puff the skin. The larger end is ideal for the forehead and chin, while the smaller side works around the delicate area of the eyes.

name: British Colour Standard Striped Taper Candles
description: There’s just something so elegant about taper candles and Anthropologie has a set that’s sure to please any candle lover. The 10-inch candles come in a set of four and are hand-poured in Indonesia, with an average burn time of approximately eight hours each. These would look amazing on a dining table and you can choose between six cool color-blocked options.

name: Kule Take Out Pouch
description: It’s easy to see why this adorable canvas pouch by Kule, a beloved New York-based brand, will bring a smile to anyone who receives it. You can throw it in a tote to keep all of little things from rolling around at the bottom of your bag or wear it as a clutch on its own to lend some cheer to a casual outfit.

name: We Are Knitters Balaclava DIY Kit
description: While this We Are Knitters “Take Me to the North Pole” DIY balaclava kit is fun for experienced crafters, it can make a knitter out of novices, too. It includes everything you need to make a cozy balaclava, from the easy-to-follow pattern to the knitting needles to the skein of soft ivory yarn.

name: L'Occitane Almond Shower Body Care Trio
description: Pamper your loved one with this decadent L’Occitane gift set, which features a nourishing shower oil, a moisturizing milk concentrate and a silky-smooth hand and nail cream. The almond scent is clean, fresh and ideal for anyone that prefers a muted scent profile.

name: Asus TUF M4 Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: For the Windows PC gamers on your gift list, the TUF M4 wireless gaming mouse can provide a competitive edge thanks to its six tactile and programmable buttons, ergonomic design, and 12,000 dpi optical sensor that provides high precision. The mouse uses dual connection modes via a 2.4GHz wireless and Bluetooth connection. This translates to great connection stability and fast response times. The four on-the-fly sensitivity levels allow you to make this mouse as response as you wish.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: This year, the most popular gaming console—the one that every gamer wants—is the Sony PlayStation 5. The problem is, due to continued high demand and limited supply, finding a PS5 in stock and being sold at its suggested retail price is a huge challenge this holiday season. Some retailers, like Best Buy and Target, continue to restock inventory, so with persistence and good timing, you may get lucky enough to purchase the console without having to pay a hefty premium. The PS5 is the most advanced PlayStation console yet. While it runs all PS4 games, the PS5 optimized games typically offer superior graphics, better sound and a more immersive element that other console-based systems can't achieve. For tips on where else you might find the PS5 in stock, check out our

name: Furbo 360 Dog Camera
description: As a pet parent, whether you’re running an errand across town or spending the day working at the office, you probably feel a bit guilty anytime you need to leave your pooch home alone. And that’s why Furbo exists. The Furbo 360 Dog Camera lets you spy on, talk to and feed your dog treats from afar using your smartphone. This hourglass-shaped camera lets doting pet owners monitor their pets while they’re away. Thanks to its motion sensor and motorized camera, Furbo 360 can automatically track your dog’s movement around a room, keeping Fido in frame as you watch on your phone from just about anywhere.

name: Turtle Beach Recon 200 Gen 2 Powered Gaming Headset
description: Whether the gamers on your gift list play PlayStation, Xbox or Nintendo Switch games, the Turtle Beach Recon 200 Gen 2 powered gaming headset makes any game’s audio sound amazing. The headset also features a quality microphone used to communicate with allies or adversaries when immersed in an online-based multiplayer game. This headset has a 12-hour battery life and dual foam ear cushions for maximum comfort.

name: Moft Smart Desk Mat
description: If there’s someone on your gift list that has lots of gadgets along with a cluttered desk, the Moft Smart Desk Mat is the perfect gift. Made from premium vegan leather, fiberglass and metal sheets, this desk mat is configurable with extra attachable MagSafe wireless charging pads for a smartwatch and other gadgets sold separately. The desk mat’s angle adjusts to 25, 45 or 60 degrees, so you can use it with a laptop computer or tablet or a book while reading. The Moft SmartDesk Mat works as a lap desk, too. It comes in a variety of colors.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4
description: Don’t let the high suggested retail price of this popular folding smartphone fool you. With an eligible trade-in and with other discounts offered by Samsung, Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile and U.S. Cellular, you can have this phone in your hands for less than $450, plus get a $50 Samsung Credit to spend toward accessories when you shop directly from Samsung. This waterproof phone has three versatile cameras, a fast processor and all-day battery life. The coolest thing, though, is its conversation-starting folding touchscreen display.

name: Winning Fingers Flashing Cube Electronic Memory And Brain Game
description: While this may look like a light-up Rubik’s Cube, it’s not. This cube-shaped device is really four handheld games in one—designed to be enjoyed by kids between the ages of six and 12. Winning Fingers Flashing Cube teaches hand-eye coordination and memory skills, while providing fun challenges. The built-in games are easy to learn, but extremely difficult to master.

name: Tamagotchi
description: The popular digital pet from the 1970s is back for a new generation of kids to experience. Tamagotchi is the ideal stocking stuffer for young people. The objective is to feed, play with, and care for a lovable digital pet for your keychain. There’s even a simple higher or lower number game built in that kids can play with their pet. If there’s a young

name: Vinglacé Wine Insulator
description: Keep wine or bubbly chilled for hours in this insulated canister by VinGlacé. It’s made from double-walled, vacuum-insulated stainless steel and features an adjustable top. All you have to do is unscrew the top, insert a chilled bottle of wine and start sipping.

name: Crate & Barrel Camille Long-Stem Wine Glass
description: It’s hard to go wrong with wine glasses, especially these long-stemmed, bubble-bowled beauties, which were popularized on

name: Williams Sonoma Vintage Etched Wine Glasses (Set of 4)
description: For a vintage look, these etched wine glasses are unbeatable. Featuring a gorgeous hand-cut floral pattern, these glasses would make an elegant addition to a holiday dinner table or evening happy hour spread. While clear glass is classic, these beauties also come in light blue.

name: Mullin Single-Serve Mulling Spices
description: With these single-serving mulling spices, your recipient can easily make a warm mug of mulled wine at home whenever the desire strikes. All they have to do is add a single-serve spice infuser—filled with cinnamon, clove, star anise, orange peel and stevia leaf—to their favorite fruit-forward red, then heat, steep and enjoy. Each tin comes with eight infusers.

name: In Good Taste Uncommon Grapes
description: These outside-the-box wines are sure to impress even the most discerning wine lovers. The set comes with eight small bottles of less-traditional wines, making for the perfect lineup for an at-home tasting.

name: Oster Cordless Electric Bottle Opener
description: This bestselling electric wine bottle opener is perfect for parties or everyday home use. It’s cordless and features a simple push-button operation, plus it comes with a foil cutter. The rechargeable model can open up to 30 bottles on a single charge.

name: Porter Glass
description: Enjoy a perfectly chilled glass of wine anywhere with this adorable to-go tumbler. It’s made from durable glass and wrapped in a layer of silicone for added protection, and it can hold up to 15 ounces. The tumbler is topped with a tightly sealed lid with a sliding tab for drinking and comes in a range of pretty colors, including several fun terrazzo patterns.

name: Rewined Green Glass Filled Candles
description: A pretty candle is always a great holiday gift, but it’s even better when it’s a handmade candle from Rewined. These pieces are handcrafted in South Carolina and designed to evoke the aroma of your favorite wine with subtle notes of fragrance. The soy candles are also poured in recycled wine bottles, making them both beautiful

name: Insulated Double Bottle Travel Tote
description: For the person who shows up to every event with a bottle of wine in tow, this insulated travel tote will make their job much easier, keeping wine at the perfect temperature during transit. The stately bag is made from a waxed cotton canvas and has leatherette straps. Plus, it comes in two sizes, allowing you to easily carry two or three bottles at a time.

name: J. Crew Checker-Stitch Cotton Shawl Cardigan
description: Yes, sweaters can be a predictable gift for Dad, but this J. Crew shawl cardigan isn’t an ordinary sweater. Everyone looks about 10 points cooler in a cardigan, and this number—made from 100% cotton with a snazzy checkered stitch—works as an essential staple for Dad’s favorite comfy outfit, perfect for both lounging around and taking a work-from-home Zoom call.

name: Coravin Timeless Three+
description: A Coravin wine preservation system lets Dad tap into some of his prized vintages without actually opening the bottle, preserving the wine for months or even years. The secret of the system: It distills the contents of the bottle through a tiny needle and fills the open bottle with ultra-pure argon gas to keep it pristine. This package is everything dad needs to get started with the next level in wine preservation.

name: L.L. Bean Men's Wicked Good Moccasins
description: Every dad needs slippers—especially the one who has cold feet because he keeps the thermostat too low. These moccasins are warm, soft and comfy, and made of sheepskin to nestle your dad’s feet in a cushiony pillow of bliss, while shearling insulates and wicks away moisture. They are also rugged enough to stand up to year-round abuse, thanks to their double outsole and rawhide laces.

name: Gentlemen's Hardware Travel Hammock
description: This durable hammock can support up to 220 pounds. It’s easy to hang between two trees and rolls up into a very compact travel bag for storage and transport. This is a great gift whether your dad goes camping or just wants to hang out in the backyard.

name: Nike Roshe G Men's Golf Shoe
description: If Dad’s ready for a new pair of golf shoes, these Nikes are a little trendier than your classic FootJoys, but offer just as much traction and support—and they have better breathability. Since they don’t look like a golf shoe, Dad can wear them anywhere.

name: Razer Viper V2 Pro HyperSpeed Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: If your dad is as obsessed with video games as he was when he was 17 and still regularly plays GTA5, COD or Fortnite, feed his gaming obsession with a mouse worthy of an elite gamer.
