The Razer Viper v2 is one of the best-performing mice you can buy with a 30K DPI optical sensor and five programmable buttons.

name: Meater Plus Smart Meat Thermometer
description: Equipped with two sensors so it can measure the temperature of the meat as well as the ambient temperature of the oven or grill, Meater Plus can help Dad cook meats perfectly. The wireless transmitter can monitor cooking from up to 165 feet away, and the always-ready probe charges in its AAA battery-powered dock.

name: D.R. Harris Three Piece Shaving Set
description: Anyone can get an electric razor and slice the stubble off their face. The D.R. Harris Chrome and Resin Three-Piece Shaving Set is a luxury for men who want to enjoy the process of shaving, who love the feel of warm cream on their face and thrill at the idea of handling the brush and razor, then hanging the tools back on the stand when they’re done. It’s not inexpensive, but for the right dad, it’s better than a lifetime supply of razor blades.

name: Williams Sonoma Gift Crate European Cheese & Charcuterie
description: If Dad likes to snack before the big dinner, consider giving him his own charcuterie board full of treats. This crate is filled with nitrate-free meats like Black Forest Schinken, Salame Rustico and Prosciutto Crudo Italiano Addobbo, as well as cheeses like Caprino Piemontese, Panpetato and Swiss Diablo.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Active Wireless Earbuds
description: AirPods are fine, but Jabra’s Elite 7 Active earbuds are among the best true wireless earbuds you can buy, and our pick for

name: Coffee & Motivation Teaching Is A Work Of Heart Candle
description: Designed by the aptly named company Coffee & Motivation, the label on this handpoured candle says it all with a heartfelt appreciation. Choose from five scents with tantalizing names like “Smells Really Good” and “Best Spa Day Ever.”

name: Scentered Happy Aromatherapy Essential Oils Balm Stick
description: We could all use a dose of serenity, but maybe especially teachers. These essential oil stick can be rolled on before bed, or just between class periods, to help anyone find a moment of zen. It’s the perfect pocket-size gift for teachers.

name: Parker Clay Abeba Leather Envelope
description: Every teacher deserves a little luxury, and this handcrafted leather envelop is an upgraded essential. Suitable for anything from stashing in a suitcase to completing a night-out ensemble, it’s extremely versatile. But here’s the best part: Parker Clay offers dignified employment and training for at-risk women in Ethiopia. Each purchase helps support their salaries.

name: Here Here Market Female Founders Food Collection
description: Gift baskets are always a great idea, especially when they involve food. The Here Here Market Female Founders Food Collection features unique picks from woman-owned businesses across the nation (which in turn helps support them). Speaking from experience, the Crunch Party snack mix is highly addicting, the Six-Ball Cake Sampler is a cake lover’s dream and the Everything Sauce is nearly life-changing.

name: West Elm Marble Vanity Bookends (Set Of Two)
description: This set of sophisticated bookends will elevate any bookshelf, whether at home or in the classroom. Made from natural marble, these weighty accessories will keep a teacher’s favorite reads from toppling over and even double as a fancy door stopper.

name: Street Level Reversible Faux Leather Tote
description: This faux leather tote is roomy enough to hold school essentials like folders, papers to grade, a water bottle and comfortable flats, but it’s sleek enough to use for just about anything. A cool feature: It’s reversible, so you can choose from black and cognac, black and brown leopard or taupe and ivory. There’s even a matching wristlet that’s included.

name: Ornami Skincare Bestie Combo
description: In addition to offering sumptuous self-care products, Ornami’s packaging is undeniably fun. Grab the Bestie Combo for your favorite teacher who’ll enjoy exfoliating with the “No Scrubs” body scrub and then slathering on some “Let That Mango” body butter after a long day at school.

name: Rifle Paper Co. Garden Party Tackle Box
description: Leave it to Rifle Paper Co. to deliver the prettiest office supplies. The Garden Party Tackle Box will brighten up (and help organize) any teacher’s desk or drawer. Cute office supplies not included but highly encouraged.

name: Foot Spa Bath Massager
description: With 16 non-motorized massage rollers and a jacuzzi-like bubbling function, this heated foot massager gives teachers some well-deserved pampering. Plus, it will help relieve some of those daily aches and pains that come with standing on your feet all day.

name: The Nori Press
description: Does anyone have time to iron these days? Treat your bestie teacher friend with this viral, handheld wrinkle destroyer. It steams or presses clothing with six fabric settings, so they can look fresh.

name: Rains Folded Wallet
description: This slim but stylish wallet will keep all their essential cards and passes organized in its waterproof exterior. We just named this streamlined wallet to our

name: The White Company Cashmere Bed Socks
description: As temps continue to fall, nothing is more luxurious than slipping into some plush cashmere socks before bed, and this pair by The White Company is as exquisitely soft as they come. Available in gray, cream and pale pink, the socks are made with high-quality sustainably produced cashmere and are independently certified by The Good Cashmere Standard.

name: The Comfy Original Wearable Blanket
description: We’re not sure whether to call it a “blanket you can wear” or a “sweatshirt that feels like a blanket.” Truth be told, The Comfy is

name: Magic Makers Neck Massager
description: There are few gifts more appreciated than a complimentary trip to the spa—but this massager’s the second best thing out there. It works to combat neck and back pain with heat, eight different massaging capabilities and a just-right size and shape.

name: L.L Bean Men's Sweater Fleece Scuffs
description: Lined with 300-weight polyester fleece, these lightweight L.L. Bean Scuffs (which come in navy blue and light grey) are perfect for wearing around the house during the cooler months. While you probably wouldn’t want to wear these for prolonged periods outside, as the midsole is made of foam, the molded rubber sole allows for quick runs to the mailbox and short puppy potty breaks.

name: Pure Daily Care Ultimate Aromatherapy Diffuser And Essential Oil Set
description: This highly rated ultrasonic essence

name: Happy Socks Healthy Lifestyle Socks Gift Set
description: The opposite of boring socks, Sweden-based Happy Socks is known for its vibrant patterns and tongue-in-cheek designs. The bestselling “Healthy Lifestyle” set includes four unisex pairs inspired by everything from juicing to working out, and offers a witty take on wellness while also upping your sock game.

name: Nordstrom Bliss Plush Throw
description: This bestselling plush blanket throw has racked up thousands of reviews and feels as soft as velvet. It’s machine-washable and comes in an array of classic and on-trend colors, making it the foolproof gift to cuddle up with this season.

name: Fellow Monty Milk Art Cups
description: From their tea kettles to grinders to coffee makers, Fellow products are sleek and never look like any eyesore on any kitchen counter. The same goes for their cups. The Monty was specifically designed for latte art (thanks to the curved base) but it’s equally as great for any cup of caffeine. The double wall ceramic mug holds 11 ounces and has a graphite bottom that isn’t just stylish, but also makes stacking a breeze.

name: Artifact Uprising Softcover Mini Photo Book
description: Even the most unsentimental person will appreciate the thought and personalization of this present. Take your fave photos (or what you know are their favorite pics) and upload them to create a mini photo book via Artifact Uprising. The process is super easy and produces a one-of-a-kind product. Add up to 120 pages (30 pages is the minimum) and the matte cover would look great displayed on a desk or coffee table.

name: Everlane The ReNew Transit Bag
description: The days of a fanny pack giving major tourist vibes are over. Though Everlane’s bag can be worn as a fanny pack, it’s effortlessly worn over the shoulder, like a crossbody, and is roomy enough to hold all of the essentials for the guy on the go. Exterior zipper pockets provide quick access to necessities like a phone or keys and the interior is spacious. There’s a forever classic like taupe, but the bag is also available in fun hues like teal and olive green. In true Everlane fashion, the bag is made of recycled materials.

name: Kona Grill Mat & Grill Pan - The Ultimate Non-Stick Grilling Tray Combo
description: Know someone who takes grilling seriously? Then they probably need this perfect combo of grill accessories. Kona’s grill mat and pan duo are placed over a grill for a non-stick experience, whether you’re whipping up veggies or a medium rare steak. While the tray has perforations and openings to get a truly smoky flavor, the mat is completely solid and ideal for smaller items or a stir fry. The 100% steel trays are easy to clean and durable.

name: Huron The Face Kit
description: Perfect for busy dads or frequent travelers, Huron’s The Face Kit bills itself as a simple, no-routine face care regimen. The trio consists of a cleanse & exfoliate face wash, a smooth & soothe face moisturizer and cool & de-puff eye stick that will work wonders on weary Zoom-fatigued eyes.

name: Anker Travel Power Strip
description: One of the biggest challenges frequent travelers face when staying at a hotel or enjoying a cruise vacation is a lack of available power outlets to charge all of their gadgets. The Anker Power Strip is easy to travel with and provides three traditional power outlets, two USB Type-A ports and one USB Type-C port in a single, 2.2-inch, cube-shaped hub that has a five-foot power cord attached. Using just one outlet, someone can charge their computer, smartphone, tablet, wireless earbuds, camera, and other gear at the same time. It’s the perfect stocking stuffer for anyone who’s constantly on the move.

name: Divoom Pixoo-64
description: This app-controlled 64 x 64 LED panel display allows the user to showcase specific information—from a weather forecast to stock prices—along with the time and date. However, it can also display custom animations that include text and graphics. For a social media influencer, the display works as a real-time view or subscriber counter too. Pixoo-64 provides a fun and decorative way to display digital information in a game room or office.

name: Seckton Kids Selfie Camera
description: There’s no better way to introduce kids, between the ages of three and nine, to the fun and creative aspects of digital photography than to provide them with a working digital camera designed just for them. This is an 8MP camera that can shoot still images or 1080p video that gets stored internally on an included 32GB microSD memory card. The battery powered camera offers large buttons and an easy to hold design that’s durable. There’s also a built in time lapse and separate timer feature. Young photographers can easily add any of 28 digital frames and six color filters to their images using the camera.  The rear display makes operating the camera super easy.

name: Tractive Waterproof GPS Dog Tracker
description: For a puppy (or dog) that always manages to escape, this affordable GPS tracker makes it easy to locate that canine explorer quickly. The small, lightweight, waterproof and durable device attaches to a dog’s collar and offers real-time location tracking via a mobile app. It also keeps track of where your dog has been. It requires a subscription plan (plans start at $4.99 per month). This tracker also monitors your dog’s activity level and calories burned, so you can adjust their diet accordingly.

name: Ricoh GR IIIx Point-And-Shoot Camera
description: If you’re looking for the perfect camera to give to someone who enjoys digital photography but doesn’t want to carry around a lot of heavy gear, the Ricoh GR IIIx was our pick for

name: Purrble: Calming Toy Companion with Dynamic Heartbeat and Soothing Purr
description: This adorable plush toy is an interactive calming tool for kids and adults alike. This creature has a virtual heartbeat that changes when its emotion changes. Helping calm Purrble can, in the process, calm the person holding it, too.

name: Arcade 1Up 32-Inch Infinity Game Table
description: For a family that enjoys classic board games, the Arcade 1Up 32-Inch Infinity Game Table offers a large, full-color touchscreen a group can use to play digital versions of board games. And since they’re digital, loved ones away from home can join in on the fun via the internet. In addition to popular board games—including Hasbro’s Monopoly, Scrabble, Trivial Pursuit, Yahtzee and Chutes and Ladders—the Arcade 1Up offers access to classic card games, puzzles, coloring books and other kid- and family-friendly activities.

name: Moft Z Sit-Stand Laptop Desk
description: One of the drawbacks to working with a laptop computer is that it’s often difficult to position it at the perfect height and angle. With the Most Sit-Stand Laptop Desk, you can choose from four angles (25, 35, 45 or 60 degrees), plus adjust the height so you can comfortably use your laptop computer while sitting or standing. The best thing about the Moft Sit-Stand Laptop Desk is that it folds down to just 9.4 x 11 x 0.5 inches for easy transport but sets up in seconds with no tools required. The 30-ounce stand is sturdy and holds up to 22 pounds. It’s a perfect gift for remote workers.

name: Wine Folly: The Master Guide
description: If you’re wondering whether this book is any good,

name: Riedel Winewings Tasting Wine Glass Set (Set of 4)
description: These wine glasses have an eye-catching shape, but the design isn’t just for aesthetic appeal. The Winewings collection from Riedel features flat-bottomed glasses that increase the surface area of the wine, which speeds up the rate of evaporation and produces a more distinct aroma. This set of four includes special glasses for Cabernet Sauvignon, Pinot Noir, Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay, making it ideal for wine-lovers who frequently host at-home tastings.

name: Coravin Model Three Wine Preservation System
description: Wine loses its freshness when exposed to air for too long and for those who typically only drink one glass of wine at a time, a preservation system can make a world of difference. This unique system actually inserts a needle through the cork to pressurize the bottle, allowing you to pour a glass without ever removing the stopper. The cork naturally reseals itself when the clamp is removed, keeping the wine fresh for weeks or months.

name: Williams Sonoma Gift Crate European Cheese & Charcuterie
description: If the wine connoisseur in your life also loves hosting, you can’t miss with this rich selection of cured meats and creamy European cheeses for a gorgeous charcuterie board. Meats include prosciutto and salame rustico, whereas cheeses include a Swiss favorite and a soft Italian variety; there’s also a classic Italian cake. All that’s missing are crackers for serving and, of course, wine.

name: Anna New York Vida Wine Stones
description: Say goodbye to ice cubes watering down not-quite-chilled wine. These pretty fluorite spheres are designed to be used in glasses of white wine, and they’ll keep your drink cool for hours without diluting it. The stones can be kept in the freezer until you need them, and you can wash and reuse them endlessly.

name: West Elm Wine O Felt Wine Markers (Set of 12)
description: Wine charms and markers are perfect for anyone who regularly hosts parties, as they allow everyone to keep track of their drink. These understated wine markers are sure to earn compliments, as they’re made from stain-resistant merino wool and come in a variety of vibrant colors. They also feature a scratch-free design so you don’t have to worry about damaging glasses.

name: Pottery Barn Vino Handblown Glass Wine Decanter
description: This gorgeous decanter is sure to be the star of any bar cart. Featuring a chic asymmetrical spout that allows for smooth pouring, this handblown vessel can easily accommodate a full 750-ml bottle of wine. Paired with a set of nice wine glasses, it would be a wonderful gift for your favorite host.

name: Dragon Glassware Wine Glasses (Set Of 4)
description: No matter how big their drinkware collection may be, a cool new addition is always welcome. These stemless wine glasses from Dragon Glassware are pretty enough for serving or display, and their sculptural shape isn’t just striking, it’s also easy to grip.

name: Insignia Stainless Steel 14-Bottle Wine Cooler
description: If you really want to impress an amateur sommelier, a countertop

name: Crate & Barrel Champagne Stopper
description: For those who like to indulge in the occasional breakfast mimosa, a champagne stopper is a useful item to have in the kitchen. This chrome-plated stopper clamps tightly onto a bottle of sparkling wine, providing just the right amount of pressure to preserve the beverage’s signature bubbles. And just like that: no more wasted champagne.

name: Sugarfina Rosé All Day Bears
description: Does the wine lover on your list also have a sweet tooth? Consider these pretty pink gummy bears, which are imported from Germany and infused with rosé wine from Provence. Simply pair with your favorite movie (and maybe even a glass of actual rosé, if you’re feeling indulgent).

name: Stackable Wine Glasses (Set of 6)
description: Sometimes, you don’t want to clutch a delicate stemmed wine glass. You’d rather, in those cases, drink your wine out of something chunkier and less fragile. Enter these dishwasher-safe vessels, made from super durable tempered glass. And because they’re stackable, they’re especially great for those who are short on space.

name: Wondrium
description: MasterClass and its celebrity instructors is admittedly awesome. But Wondrium, formerly called The Great Courses, has a smorgasbord of online educational videos, too. Where MasterClass emphasizes glitz and glamor, Wondrium streams classes and documentaries that will make Dad feel like he’s in a fascinating and engaging college lecture hall. This is where to send your lifelong learning Dad for as little as $13 per month.

name: Box One Presented By Neil Patrick Harris
description: If Dad loves puzzles and adventures but no one else in the family can muster a lot of enthusiasm for escape rooms, Neil Patrick Harris has just the thing for him. Box One is a clever, funny and wholly unexpected adventure designed by everyone’s favorite Doogie Howser. It is designed to be played alone, but it’s also a blast for two people (like Mom and Dad together) to work through.

name: The Redstone Outdoor Hiking & Climbing Knife
description: This multipurpose knife from The James Brand makes it easy for Dad to be ready for anything on any outdoor adventure. It has a modern, one-piece design and a handy finger rest that provides a better grip on the knife. It uses Sandvik 12C27 stainless steel. The handle comes in a wide range of colors to fit his personality and style.

name: Jack Black Beard Oil
description: Dad probably keeps his feelings about his itchy beard to himself, but now you can help him solve his beard struggles with Jack Black Beard Oil. With Katahari Melon Oil and Vitamin E, a few squirts rubbed into his beard every day will relieve the itchiness.

name: Goldbelly E-Gift Card
description: Pizza from Chicago, cheesesteaks from Philadelphia, bagels from New York City, tacos from Austin. Whether your Dad fondly remembers the awesome food at a restaurant 2,000 miles away, or he just likes to sample food from iconic diners around the country, a Goldbelly gift card will help him enjoy a new restaurant or revisit an old favorite without leaving home.

name: Kamado Joe Jr. 13.5-inch Charcoal Grill
description: If Dad’s already a BBQ ace, his eye might already be on a kamado-style grill. It’s a beloved form factor among outdoor foodies because the all-ceramic construction is ideal for retaining heat. This petite version from Kamado Joe clocks in at 68-pounds and has a cast iron stand for convenient carrying—to the tailgate, camping and more.

name: Bevel Beard Trimmer
description: If Dad’s beard has gotten a little out of control, this sleek,

name: Boston Red Sox Cooperstown Two Tone '47 Clean Up
description: If Dad can’t wait for the upcoming season, what better way to show his commitment to his favorite team than with a vintage logo cap? Whether he’s into the Yankees, Astros, Phillies, Mets or Pirates, there’s something for him here with every MLB team properly represented.

name: Ember Temperature Control Smart Mug 2
description: It’s the holy grail for coffee fans—a mug that keeps coffee warm for hours, no matter how long you nurse it. If Dad likes to drink the hot stuff at his desk, Ember's Smart Mug 2 can keep 10 ounces of liquid hot for 1.5 hours at a time—or all day long if the mug sits on its charging coaster. Using the app, Dad can dial in the precise temperature he wants, from 120 to 145 degrees.

name: Fjallraven Solid Re-Wool Scarf
description: Upgrade Dad’s decades-old scarf with this classic solid muffler from Fjallraven. Made from recycled wool that would otherwise be discarded along with other fabric scraps, it features classic fringe detail at the ends and a leather logo that adds a note of sophistication.

name: Phomemo D30 Label Maker Machine
description: This mini labeler will help them keep everything organized in the classroom—and ensure all items are returned, too! It’ll also save their hands from another round of writing, and it’s on sale for just $30.

name: Carhartt Deluxe Dual Compartment Insulated Lunch Cooler Bag
description: Carhartt is known for creating rugged gear that lasts, and this insulated lunch bag is no exception. It’s water repellent and has enough room for a six-pack, just in case your favorite teacher wants to use it after-hours. It includes a separate top compartment that’s also insulated and front zippered pouch for holding utensils, crackers and more.

name: Target Gift Card
description: Because you can’t go wrong with a gift card... Target allows you to load up a card with whatever price you prefer. Target is a great option for teachers, because, not only does it have supplies they may need for class, the retail giant is also packed with great home decor, clothing and personal care items, so your teacher can splurge on themselves.

name: The Cookie Faves Tin
description: In case you haven’t heard (or tasted), Milk Bar cookies are

name: Alex And Ani Teacher Charm Bangle
description: Known for designing jewelry inspired by meaningful moments, Alex and Ani’s Teacher Charm Bangle is a wonderful way to share the sentiment and to recognize their daily contributions. It comes in both gold and silver finishes.

name: Knock Knock Why You're the Best Teacher Ever Cards
description: Have a teacher in mind who’s really impacted your child’s life? Let your kiddo say it in their own words (with helpful prompts) with one of Knock Knock’s fan-favorite “fill in the love” books. This one is called “Why You’re The Best Teacher Ever,” but one warning: It may induce teacher tears.

name: Stonewall Kitchen Sampler Gift Basket
description: With six jars, it’ll be easy for them to share these treats with a crowd over the holidays. Of course, they might also appreciate opening a jar at a time as a special solo spread. The New England-themed gift basket from the delicious, Maine-based Stonewall Kitchen includes its iconic Wild Maine Blueberry jam, as well as two more jams, two mustards and a red pepper jelly.

name: Hey Rowan Guitar Studs
description: Ideal for music teachers or that sweet kindergarten teacher who always breaks into song, these sweet guitar studs will be worn on repeat. They’re hypoallergenic and made of high-quality materials like 14k gold vermeil over sterling silver. As an added bonus, they’re currently 50% off. We also saw a sweet pair of

name: Awake Caffeinated Chocolate Bites
description: For the teacher who runs on caffeine (who can blame them?), these caffeinated bites are a fun and unexpected gift. Each adorable owl-shaped chocolate has the same amount of caffeine as half a cup of coffee, making them ideal for stashing in a bag or pocket for those times when guzzling more java just isn’t an option.

name: Teachers Pay Teachers Gift Card
description: Want to help a teacher with the cost of school supplies? Give a gift card from Teachers Pay Teachers, a marketplace where educators share, sell and buy original teaching resources. Cards can be redeemed for lesson plans, worksheets, assessments and more.

name: Yeti Rambler 14-Ounces Mug
description: Yeti has built up a cult following for its untouchable ability to keep things incredibly cold or hot. This mug is perfect for transporting coffee, chili or soup, doubling as a drink-holder or lunch container. Choose from a range of colors.

name: The Chili Lab Homemade Hot Sauce Kit
description: This DIY hot sauce kit has everything you need to whip up your own spicy small-batch condiments. You’ll learn how to make two distinctive spice mixes: Forager’s Blend, which is a vibrant sauce with notes of red berries and woodsmoke, and Grove Blend, a bright, flavorful sauce with hints of citrus and herbs. You’ll want to spread it on everything from burgers to scrambled eggs to Christmas dinner leftovers.

name: Lululemon Fast and Free Running Hat
description: This lightweight, stretchy cap is ideal for runners or for simply running errands. It features an interior front-mesh fabric panel and sweatband for instant moisture-wicking and an adjustable back closure for a snug, custom fit. It’s also available in six colors that’ll delight everyone from the minimalist to the trendy neon lover.

name: Yeti Rambler Kids Reusable Bottle
description: Tiny but mighty, this dishwasher-safe bottle will have your kids wasting less plastic and feeling snazzy to boot (how sweet is that colorful design?). A sweat-free design means it won’t form condensation and slip out of their hands, and a shatter-proof exterior adds to the overall durability. It’s a gift they’ll keep—and use—for years.

name: Kid Made Modern Arts And Crafts Library
description: Why stop at just one set of crafting supplies when you can give them

name: Risa's Pieces Rainbow Bracelet Set
description: A set of three bracelets, one topped off with white and black letters spelling out their name, will make your kids’ holiday. Simply input your personalization before checking out on the retailer’s website, then receive a custom piece of jewelry in the mail. (Note that this is not a suitable gift for children under the age of 3.)

name: Uncommon Goods Exploding Hand Soap Rainbow Gift Set
description: Who said washing your hands couldn’t be fun? With these “explosive” soap pods in tow, it’ll soon become your kids’ favorite activity. There are five colors included in every set, so you can present them all to one lucky child or dole them out to a larger group, one by one.

name: ThinkFun Gravity Maze
description: The manufacturer behind this challenging game has sold over 50 million worldwide since it first debuted, so you can be sure you’re looking at a quality gift. Part mind-bending puzzle, part “marble run,” this STEM-centric toy is perfect for kids over the age of 8. It’s easy to get the hang of, so anyone can join in—including the older set.

name: Crate & Kids A Taste of the World
description: Help your kids learn about new dishes from all over the world with this delightful, celebratory book. Chock full of fun factoids and charming explorations of a wide range of cuisines and traditions,

name: Wonderbly Custom "Where Are You?" Book
description: Odds are, your kid’s wished they could be the protagonist of one of the books you’ve read to them at bedtime. Well, here’s their chance: In the pages of these custom

name: Lovevery Crawl Tunnel
description: Playtime isn’t just fun for kids, but can also help them develop social and motor skills. This play tunnel from Lovevery, which measures 47 inches long, is designed for tots 12 months and up and is sure to provide hide and seek fun or a simple game of peek-a-boo. Parents love the soft material of the tunnel, which contains organic cotton. The colorful tunnel can easily stay in the corner of a room, but it also conveniently collapses and folds into the accompanying carrying case.

name: Lalo Big Bites Starter Kit
description: When the big boy or girl in your life isn’t quite ready to handle breakable dishware just yet, Lalo’s Big Bites Starter Kit is the perfect set. It comes with utensils, a cup and a bowl and plate with high sides. Kids will love feeling like a big kid while eating out of a dish that has a more grown up feel. And parents will love that the material is non-toxic, BPA-free and dishwasher safe. With fun colors, like blueberry and popcorn, it might even encourage kids to eat their veggies. Maybe.

name: Exploding Kittens Party Pack Card Game
description: The uber-popular Exploding Kitten card game continues to be a great gift for kids. The Party Pack accommodates up to 10 players and it’s an easy game for anyone to learn. Basically, the aim is to stay alive and if you draw the Exploding Kitten card, you’re out. The Party Pack comes with 120 cards and is easily an addictive game for family night.

name: Rebrilliant Gardner Bamboo Bath Caddy
description: If the wine lover on your list needs a little help relaxing, you can’t go wrong with this bestselling bamboo bath caddy, which can support everything you need during bathtime: a good novel, a

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Wine Making Kit
description: Test your Vintner skills this holiday season with this convenient wine-making kit. Ideal for beginners, the kit comes with everything you need to make a gallon of Cabernet Sauvignon, including a glass carboy, funnel and yeast additives.

name: Wine Food: New Adventures In Drinking And Cooking
description: Vino and good food go hand-in-hand, and this cookbook offers a plethora of recipes that will pair perfectly with all sorts of wine. It features a collection of 75 recipes inspired by different types of wine, as well as an explanation of why the pairing works well together and recommendations for specific brands.

name: Frontgate Weston Two-Bottle Wine Caddy
description: Perfect for holiday gatherings, this wine caddy has space for two bottles of wine and four stemmed wine glasses, and it comes with four ceramic dishes that can be used to serve cheese, crackers and other snacks. The design is crafted from mango wood and wrought iron and it comes with a removable second tier in case you want to use it solely as a serving tray.

name: Wine Away Red Wine Stain Remover
description: Even the most experienced connoisseurs spill their drink now and then, which is why a bottle of Wine Away is a must-have for every wine enthusiast. This special stain remover works incredibly well on both fresh and dried wine spots and it leaves a light citrus scent behind.

name: Easton Studio Marble Wine Cooler
description: This marble wine cooler combines function and style by keeping bottles of vino cool while looking beautiful on a table or countertop. (By the way, it can also double as a flower vase.) It’s available in black or white marble to go with any decor and the brass accent down the center adds a trendy finishing touch.

name: The Universal
description: The makers of this gorgeous glass claim it’s perfect for every type of wine, which makes it a winning gift no matter the personal preferences of your particular recipient. It’s also just downright nice to look at.

name: The Wine Bible
description: If you’re looking to entertain and educate all at once, look no further than this page-turned from an expert wine enthusiast. Your recipient will learn all there is to know about wine, from climate and terroir to fundamental varietal names.

name: Yeti Rambler 10-Ounce Wine Tumbler
description: Made from stainless steel and available in a number of cool colorways, it’s easy to see why Yeti products are so popular. This Rambler is great for holding wine, but it’s also ideal for both hot and cold beverages of any kind, thanks to its double-walled vacuum insulation.

name: LuLu Metallic Wine Glass Markers
description: If losing their drink is

name: Theragun Elite Handheld Percussive Massage Device
description: Help Dad relieve his bad back, stiff neck or sore muscles with a Theragun percussive massager. It comes with five different heads to target different areas. And the Therabody app personalizes a unique wellness routine based on Dad’s activity, injuries and ailments.

name: Tribit StormBox Micro 2 Bluetooth Speaker
description: Wireless, weatherproof and drop-resistant. The Tribit StormBox Micro 2 is a rugged and resilient portable speaker, but the best part is that it sounds amazing—especially considering its small size and affordable price. If Dad loves music, he’ll adore owning the StormBox Micro 2.

name: Ugg Ascot Slipper
description: We love the rubber soles on these fur-lined Ugg slippers, which make them just as good for wearing around the house as they are for taking out the garbage or checking the mail.

name: Monkees Knit Beanie
description: For a dad of a certain age, growing up watching

name: Geometric Whiskey Stones (Set of 4)
description: There’s no denying the utility of a whiskey stone to reliably chill down a drink without diluting it. We particularly like these sculptural ones, made from marble and soapstone, which do it with a little extra flair. Each stone in the set is a different shape and color.

name: Furbo 360-Degree Dog Cam
description: Dad maintained he didn’t want a family dog until you brought one home. Years later, they’re practically inseparable, but even if Dad has to leave the pooch alone from time to time, he can keep tabs on his furry best friend with a 360-degree dog camera that dispenses treats and offers two-way audio.

name: Oura Ring
description: Available in a range of sizes and finished, the Oura ring is designed to be comfortably worn 24/7. It automatically and accurately monitors things like heart rate, body temperature, blood oxygen levels and movement to track daily activity and sleep patterns. The ring transfers data to a smartphone, where it’s analyzed and presented in an easy-to-understand format that helps people better understand and improve their sleep, fitness level and overall health. It can even predict when the wearer might be getting sick.

name: Marshmallow Gray Warmies Boots
description: They can pop these slippers into the microwave and then sink their feet into a pair of these soothingly warmed up booties. One of our home editors recently declared these slipper boots a

name: Keurig K-Mini Coffee Maker
description: Keep your favorite teacher fueled and ready for what’s ahead with this single-serve coffee maker. At just five inches wide, it’s petite enough to perch on a desk or shelf without being obvious. It also brews cups from six to 12 ounces.

name: Levoit Air Purifier Core 300
description: It’s no secret that classrooms are full of dirt, dust and all kinds of germs. Give the gift of clean air with this HEPA air purifier. It’s petite enough to stash out of the way and can tackle spaces up to 547 square feet in 30 minutes, giving your teacher a solid clean-air radius to work with. They can flip between several settings that are right for them.

name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: Downtime is precious when you’re spending your day teaching. Help your favorite instructor kick back with a Kindle Paperwhite. This e-reader has a glare-free display that looks like real paper. It’s also made to withstand water immersion, just in case it gets accidentally dunked in the pool or bath.

name: Tennis Tumble Puzzle Toy For Dogs
description: If you know their best bud walks on four legs, then a posh treat, collar and lead or this fun puzzle toy from Wild One might be the most thoughtful teacher gift. After all, it shows you’re paying attention to the VIPs in their life, not just your child.

name: ZenBombs Bath Bombs Gift Set
description: Bath bombs are fun, no matter your age. This set of 20 bombs is crafted with shea butter and essential oils for a pampering experience every time. Your teacher can choose from 10 different scents, all artfully arranged in a cute box.

name: My Space Organizers Desk Organizer
description: Teachers have a lot of stuff to keep track of each day. Help your educator get sorted with this  handy organizer. It features nine compartments to house pencils, pens, scissors, sticky notes, paper clips and more, in one tidy spot. Choose from four finishes, including a cool marble look.

name: Echo Dot With clock
description: A smart speaker might feel like a splurge at first but look again. Amazon continues to drop the prices on its Echo smart speakers. The petite Dot, newly released, can play music, podcasts, keep everyone on task with timers and it now displays the time, which is handy for any teacher’s room.

name: Catan Board Game
description: Whether she keeps it in the classroom or plays at home, this popular family board game is a great way to flex those strategic thinking muscles away from the Chromebook. It’s a crowdpleaser and a fun way to pass the more quiet winter months as you compete to build cities and acquire resources.

name: W&P Microwave Silicone Popper Maker
description: This collapsible popcorn maker packs up flat, so she tuck it into her backpack and then use it in the teacher’s lounge when that craving calls, or keep it stored at home for movie night. It’s a cinch to clean and has popped my corn perfectly every time.

name: Kiehl's Hydrating Hand Care Set
description: A trio of Kiehl’s best hand lotions may be just the antidote they need after all handwashing sessions post-classroom. This set is packed up all pretty for gift giving this holiday season, too. Enjoy the lavender -scented cream, Kiehl’s Ultimate Strength Hand Salve and a grapefruit-scented cream. Each is small enough to stash in a bag or desk drawer.

name: J.Crew Kids' Long-Sleeve Pajama Set
description: This cheerful cotton PJ set from J.Crew is a best-seller for a reason. It comes in a large range of kids’ sizes (2 - 14) and in eleven different colors and patterns that range from leopard print to seasonal holiday motifs like plaid and candy cane-stripes. Imaginative bedtime story not included.

name: Melissa & Doug My First Daily Magnetic Calendar
description: Designed for ages three to seven, this Melissa & Doug magnetic calendar displays the day of the week, the date, the weather and upcoming holidays, encouraging little ones to learn and countdown to special events like birthdays. It comes with 80 different magnets that will also help them communicate and, yes, plan their busy days, too.

name: Briarpatch Scavenger Hunt for Kids Board Game
description: This inventive board game leads the ultimate indoor search-and-find expedition. Players have two minutes to hunt for silly things around the house. They can advance on the board for every item they find and move additional spaces for putting everything back where it belongs. It’s the perfect cure for post-holiday cabin fever or a blustery snow day.

name: Brooklinen Votive Candle Set
description: It’s only natural that legendary bedding brand Brooklinen would expand its home category with fragrances and candles, perfect timing for the holidays. This hand-poured downtime set contains four 2-oz. candles designed to help you relax and unwind (so essential during the busy holiday season). Plus, they smell divine and the packaging is adorable—what’s not to love?

name: Silver Oak Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: Grown in a gorgeous vineyard amidst rolling hills in Alexander Valley just outside of Napa, California, this vibrant Cabernet Sauvignon is the perfect gift to give (and to receive). Blending notes of cassis, caramel, juniper and pomegranate this ruby-colored wine adds delight to any fete, and shows up dressed to the nines for the occasion in its stately bottle.

name: Sonos Sub Mini: The Compact Subwoofer With Big Bass
description: For those who love a good speaker system, the Sub Mini is the ultimate gift; pair with other Sonos products including the Beam, Ray or One for richer and more immersive sound in any room.

name: Petite Plume Women's White Flannel Robe
description: This classic white flannel robe gets an upgrade with pretty accents of red or navy piping lining, plus super soft fabric and deep pockets to keep you warm on chilly winter evenings.

name: 111Skin Celestial Black Diamond Eye Mask
description: These super luxe eye masks from 111 Skin help combat fine lines, wrinkles and under eye darkness. Plus, individual packets make them perfect for stowing in a carry-on for a weekend getaway.

name: Carolina Herrera x Cabana Josefina Dinner Plate With Gold Rim
description: Beautiful dinnerware makes such a chic gift anytime of year, especially over the holidays when entertaining is elevated. These gold-rimmed plates, made as part of a collaboration between Carolina Herrera and Cabana Magazine, are elegant and charming—a lovely addition to any dinner table.

name: Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer
description: The Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer speeds up the often-tedious process of drying and styling hair, thanks to its powerful digital motor. Added bonus: the dryer’s intelligent heat control, which prevents extreme heat damage and helps to enhance shine.

name: OTM Cannes Cosmetic Carrier
description: This chic cosmetic case crafted from vegan saffiano leather is more than just a vessel for transporting your beauty products across the globe; it’s a conversation piece. Featuring intricately etched gold hardware, and a sleek gilded chain handle, this is a piece you’ll want to show off, not hide in a suitcase.

name: La Prairie Skin Caviar Harmony L'Extrait
description: The latest innovation from Swiss skincare brand La Prairie, this intensive extract works over time to reduce wrinkles and fine lines, and boost collagen. The gorgeous cobalt blue packaging makes it a delightful (and quite luxurious) gift to give this holiday season.

name: HauteCarat Graduated Lab Created Diamond Slider Bracelet
description: This stunning slider bracelet is the perfect jaw-dropper gift for under the Christmas tree. 14k gold is wrapped with 2.6 carats of graduated lab-created diamonds that clasps with a unique adjustable slide closure.

name: KitchenAid 2022 Design Series Blossom Tilt-Head Stand Mixer
description: With 10 speeds, an assortment of attachments and a beautiful design featuring a  hammered copper bowl, the Tilt-Head Stand Mixer is the crème de la crème of baking appliances, perfect for that pastry connoisseur who is looking for more room to fold, whip and mix ingredients.

name: Solo Stove Lite Portable Stove
description: Dad can be a tough one to shop for, but this unique Solo Stove is the perfect solution when you have no idea what to get him. A mini version of the original best-selling burner, the Lite delivers an impressive smoke-free fire perfect for smaller spaces.

name: Mela & Kera 8.5 oz. Touche Velours Shampoo
description: It’s hard to choose what to love more about Mela & Kera’s chic line of hair products—the sleek high-end packaging or the indulgent vegan formula that leaves hair velvety soft and shining brighter than the star on a Christmas tree.

name: European Wax Center Aloe Sugar Scrub
description: This sugar-based scrub is absolutely perfect for dry winter skin. It’ll smooth, buff and polish to make your entire body feel smooth as silk. Added bonus: it smells divine.

name: Joanna Vargas Magic Glow Wand
description: Celebrity facialist Joanna Vargas created this at-home tool inspired by the demand in her spa for her coveted lymphatic treatments. This USB-powered device targets multiple skin concerns in a matter of minutes, from a Hot Mode which eliminates buildup, to Hot + Massage Mode that helps skin absorb products for more effective treatments, to a Cool + Massage mode to minimize the appearance of pores.

name: 5 Star Exclusive Candle Bundle
description: When in doubt, go with a fancy candle. From their beautiful hand-painted lavender jars to their soothing scents, these soy candles make a great gift for a mom, a best friend, a co-worker—or anyone who needs a little zen in their lives. The 5 Star bundle includes four candles with different scents, including one with notes of elderflower and lilac.

name: Opulus Beauty Labs The Retinol+ Ramp UP Starter System
description: This chic-looking beauty tool does a lot more than just look good on a bathroom vanity (although it certainly does that, too). Pop an ingredient-packed Opoule into the activator and in 90 seconds it will heat and activate powerful retinol ingredients. Open it up, and apply to skin nightly—it works over the course of four weeks to slowly increase the amount of retinol so that skin doesn’t get irritated. The results? Younger looking skin and a nice little glow.

name: Beast Blender
description: Quality blenders can be clunky and large—but not the Beast Blender. Featuring a sleek modern design, this compact blender is as powerful as models twice its size. Thanks to its innovative 12-rib design, this might appliance can crush up even the biggest chunks of ice for smooth, creamy blends. Plus, the accompanying lid makes it easy to take your smoothies on the go.

name: Le Creuset Bread Oven
description: Have a bread baker in your life? You can’t go wrong with Le Creuset’s Bread Oven, which makes for perfect loaves, thanks to its cast iron construction that distributes heat evenly. Meanwhile, the domed lid traps and circulates steam and the low-profile base promotes even browning. It doesn’t hurt that it’s beautiful to look at, too.

name: OluKai Pupu Mua Genuine Shearling Scuff Slipper
description: It’s hard to find slippers more comfortable than this pair from OluKai, thanks to their fuzzy shearling construction and cushioned insoles with arch support. Plus, their sturdy, non-marking bottoms mean you can slip them to make quick runs outside to check the mailbox or walk the dog.

name: Smeg Cream 9-Speed Hand Mixer
description: Sure, this retro-style hand mixer from Smeg is absolutely gorgeous, but it’s also great at its job. Featuring 9 speed levels plus a handy turbo function, this hand mixer can whip eggs and cake batters with ease. Plus, an LED display on the top makes it a cinch to control the mixer.

name: Weezie Towels Piped Edge Starter Pack (6 Pieces)
description: Made in Portugal using 100% organic long-staple cotton, these Weezie Towels are luxuriously soft, thick and absorbent—in other words, everything you want out of bath

name: Made In The Wine Glass Set (8 Stems)
description: Hand-blown in Parma Italy, these gorgeous stemmed wine glasses from Made In are 140% more resistant to breakage. While they’re extremely lightweight, they don’t feel fragile; the stems are reinforced with titanium, resulting in extra strong glass. Each set comes with eight glasses, four for red wine and four for white wine.

name: The Large Everywhere Bag
description: Perfectly designed for long getaways and quick one-night trips alike, the Large Everywhere Bag from Away is a sleek, stylish travel must-have. Thanks to the abundance of interior and exterior pockets, organizing your belongings is easier than ever with this bag. Plus, the trolley sleeve means you can easily sit the whole thing atop your suitcase when rushing through the airport.

name: Brightland The Artist Capsule
description: You don’t have to be a master chef to appreciate some of the

name: Pottery Barn Cozy Sweater Knit Blanket
description: A massive, incredibly soft blanket is a must-have for cold days—like, for example, this option from Pottery Barn. Thanks to its knitted construction, this blanket feels just like your favorite sweater, making it perfect for movie nights or curling up with a good book.

name: Nespresso Creatista Plus Espresso Machine By Breville
description: If you have a coffee lover on your list and (you’re willing to drop a few hundred dollars on them), this Nespresso machine would make a fantastic gift. With the Creatista Plus, you can brew barista-quality drinks at home; simply insert a Nespresso brand OriginalLine capsule (or another compatible single-serve coffee capsule) and select one of the preprogrammed drink options, including flat white and latte. This machine also lets you control the temperature, volume and frothiness of your brews.

name: Nick Cave x Eli's Cheesecake Cuties
description: Love, Happiness, Equality and Peace are the hopeful messages imparted in the edible art collaboration between prolific artist Nick Cave and Chicago's legendary Eli's Cheesecake. Cave and his partner, artist Bob Faust, took Eli's Cheesecake Cuties—the third-generation family-owned bakery's popular bite-sized, chocolate enrobed cheesecake squares—to the next level by designing a completely handmade set, each sporting a different color, flavor and symbol from Cave's extraordinary and thought provoking exhibit, Forothermore, opening at the Guggenheim on November 18th. The gift contains two sets (10 Cuties) which arrive in a custom box designed by the artists (and includes overnight shipping to boot).

name: Let it Glow Holiday Set
description: This holiday skin set bundle will have you (or anyone lucky enough to be gifted it) bouncing around town with glowing skin all winter long, thanks to a brightening vitamin C face wash, a dew-enhancing serum, and Vargas’ cult favorite sheet masks that deeply hydrate and fight fine lines and wrinkles. All in all it’s the ultimate beauty set for anyone that needs a little brightening boost.

name: Sarah Flint X SteamLine Leather Carryon Luggage
description: For the frequent traveler on your list, nothing is as luxe as this navy leather carryon lined with a pretty floral pattern, accented with chic hardware. It’s undoubtedly an airport conversation piece that will stand the test of time. Added bonus: It won’t get lost in the sea of plain black suitcases at baggage claim.

name: The Siete Table: Nourishing Mexican-American Recipes from Our Kitchen
description: The foodie on your list will love thumbing through more than 100 mouth-watering gluten-free Mexican-American dishes that span every course and occasion in this new cookbook curated by Siete Family Foods’ Garza family.

name: The Mark Weekend Bag
description: Whether you’re slipping a few things inside for an after-office holiday party, or you’re packing for a relaxing weekend upstate, this chic neoprene overnight bag will accompany you there in style. I especially love the chic orange leather piping and classic black and white striped lining, finished with the signature Mark monogram.

name: Petcube Bites 2 Lite Interactive WiFi Pet Monitoring Camera
description: Have FOMO when you leave your pet home alone? Not anymore, thanks to Petcube Bites 2 Lite, the perfect at-home monitoring system. Download the app and walk out the door without any worries—the Petcube allows you to watch your pet via wifi video no matter where in the world you are. Plus, you can talk to your pet right from the app, listen to what they’re up to, and automatically dispense treats on command, making it a great gift for anyone with a furry friend.

name: Double Vision Ear Climber
description: I love dainty, understated pieces, which is why I love just about everything from jewelry brand Uncommon James. For an elegant but trendy gift this season, I am especially drawn to these gold ear climbers, which give the illusion of two earrings in one, with just a little bit of glitz. I’ll be gifting these to all the stylish ladies on my list (and likely one more pair for myself).

name: The Un-Carrier On Carry-On Luggage
